declarations.text: No closed door can stop the fulfillment of the destiny I have prepared for you.
I hold the keys to every door, and I will open the right ones for you.
Closed doors are opportunities for My supernatural intervention in your life.
I am the God of breakthroughs; trust me to break through every closed door for you.
I am blessed because I walk with God.
I am blessed in my coming in and blessed going out.
I am a victorious warrior, walking confidently into my destiny.
Everyday is a new chance to move closer to my destiny.
I expect to fulfill my purpose with clarity and confidence.
I expect opportunities that align with my God given destiny.
I expect to overcome every obstacle with resilience and strength.
I expect divine guidance to lead me to my destiny.
I expect my gifts to make a meaningful impact on the world.
I expect to grow wiser and stronger each day on my path.
I expect fulfillment in every step toward my destiny.
I expect my journey to be guided with purpose and passion.
I expect new doors to open as I walk in alignment with my calling.
I expect to be surrounded by people who support my purpose.
I expect breakthroughs that move me closer to my destiny.
I expect my intuition to guide me accurately on my journey.
I expect my actions to align with my purpose daily.
I expect abundance in all forms as I pursue my destiny.
I expect joy and fulfillment as I walk in my true calling.
I declare that God’s plans for me are prosperous and purposeful.
I declare that I am fearfully and wonderfully made to fulfill my calling.
I declare that God equips me with everything I need to complete my destiny.
I declare that I walk in alignment with God’s perfect will for my life.
I declare that every step I take is guided by God’s wisdom and love.
I declare that no weapon formed against my destiny shall prosper.
I declare that my gifts will open doors and bring me before great people.
I declare that the Lord’s favor surrounds me as I walk in my calling.
I declare that God’s grace empowers me to fulfill my purpose.
I declare that the Lord establishes my steps and directs my path.
I declare that God’s promises over my life will be fulfilled in due time.
I declare that I have the mind of Christ, enabling me to fulfill my calling.
I declare that God’s purpose for my life will be accomplished through me.
I declare that I walk in boldness, knowing God has called me for His purpose.
I declare that the Lord completes the good work He began in me.
Let there be divine guidance in every step I take toward my purpose.
Let there be clarity and wisdom in my decisions as I pursue my destiny.
Let there be open doors that align with God’s calling on my life.
Let there be an overflow of courage as I walk boldly in my calling.
Let there be strength to overcome every obstacle in my path.
Let there be favor with others as I pursue God’s purpose for me.
Let there be peace and confidence as I trust in God’s plan for my life.
Let there be joy in every step as I walk in alignment with my destiny.
Let there be supernatural wisdom to discern my next steps.
Let there be a clear vision of the path God has set before me.
Let there be protection from distractions that deter me from my calling.
Let there be an increase in my gifts, used to serve my purpose.
Let there be a continual reminder of God’s promises over my life.
Let there be provision and abundance as I fulfill my destiny.
Let there be unwavering faith as I step into my God-given calling.
I am guided by God’s wisdom in every step of my journey.
I am strengthened by God to fulfill my purpose, no matter the challenges.
I am walking confidently in the path God has set before me.
I am empowered by the Holy Spirit to accomplish my destiny.
I am surrounded by God’s favor as I pursue my calling.
I am resilient, knowing God is with me in every trial and triumph.
I am protected by God’s hand, no harm will deter me from my destiny.
I am filled with God’s peace, trusting in His perfect plan for my life.
I am equipped with everything I need to fulfill God’s purpose for me.
I am a vessel of God’s light, shining brightly in my calling.
I am an overcomer, with God’s strength carrying me through.
I am fully aligned with God’s will, fulfilling my destiny with purpose.
I am growing in faith, moving boldly toward my God-given destiny.
I am confident that God’s promises over my life will be fulfilled.
I am grateful for every step, knowing God’s purpose is being revealed.
I choose to trust God’s timing in every step of my journey.
I choose to walk boldly in the calling God has placed on my life.
I choose to rely on God’s strength when challenges arise.
I choose to embrace each opportunity God brings to fulfill my purpose.
I choose to have faith in God’s promises, no matter what.
I choose to speak life over my future and my God-given destiny.
I choose to seek God’s wisdom in all my decisions.
I choose to walk in gratitude, knowing God is guiding my path.
I choose to release worry, trusting that God is in control.
I choose to move forward with courage, supported by God’s grace.
I choose to honor God’s calling by living with purpose and integrity.
I choose to let go of fear, knowing God is with me.
I choose to nurture my faith daily, aligning with God’s will.
I choose to see every obstacle as a stepping stone toward my destiny.
I choose to rely on God’s strength to accomplish my divine purpose.
In Jesus' name, I declare my path is blessed and guided by God’s hand.
In Jesus' name, I am empowered to fulfill my purpose with courage and faith.
In Jesus' name, I walk in divine favor and protection toward my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I receive wisdom and clarity for every decision.
In Jesus' name, I am strengthened to overcome every challenge before me.
In Jesus' name, I stand firm in faith, knowing God’s promises will be fulfilled.
In Jesus' name, I am equipped with everything needed to live out my calling.
In Jesus' name, I declare doors open for me in alignment with God’s purpose.
In Jesus' name, I release all doubt and walk in divine confidence.
In Jesus' name, I trust that God is working all things together for my good.
In Jesus' name, I choose faith over fear in every season of my journey.
In Jesus' name, I declare that no setback will hinder my God-given purpose.
In Jesus' name, I am filled with God’s peace, no matter the circumstances.
In Jesus' name, I proclaim that I am called, chosen, and equipped by God.
In Jesus' name, I am surrounded by God’s love and favor as I fulfill my destiny.
For I know the plans I have for you, says the Lord. They are plans for good and not for disaster, to give you a future and a hope.
And we know that God causes everything to work together for the good of those who love God and are called according to his purpose for them.
The Lord will fulfill his purpose for me; your steadfast love, O Lord, endures forever.
Commit your actions to the Lord, and your plans will succeed.
For God is working in you, giving you the desire and the power to do what pleases him.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart; do not depend on your own understanding. Seek his will in all you do, and he will show you which path to take.
Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you your heart’s desires.
You can make many plans, but the Lord’s purpose will prevail.
For we are God’s masterpiece. He has created us anew in Christ Jesus, so we can do the good things he planned for us long ago.
I cry out to God Most High, to God who will fulfill his purpose for me.
The steps of the godly are directed by the Lord. He delights in every detail of their lives.
For the Lord grants wisdom! From his mouth come knowledge and understanding.
Therefore, my dear brothers and sisters, stand firm. Let nothing move you. Always give yourselves fully to the work of the Lord, because you know that your labor in the Lord is not in vain.
My purpose is to give them a rich and satisfying life.
Now may the God of peace... equip you with all you need for doing his will. May he produce in you, through the power of Jesus Christ, every good thing that is pleasing to him.
I am blessed because I walk with God.
I am blessed in my coming in and blessed going out.
Whatever I do prospers, I am like a tree planted by the water.
I am successful because I meditate on God's Word day and night.
The favor of God surrounds me like a shield.
My steps are ordered by the Lord, and He delights in my way.
I have the mind of Christ and hold the thoughts, feelings, and purposes of His heart.
I am confident of this very thing, that He who has begun a good work in me will complete it.
I am made complete with God by my side.
I seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness, and all these things are added to me.
My God supplies all my needs!
I am seated with Christ in heavenly places.
I am God's masterpiece, and the evil one can not defeat me.
I overcome the world through my faith in Jesus.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
I am blessed because Jesus conquered the world.
I am chosen by God.
I am victorious because of Jesus.
I am more than a conqueror!
I am the head and not the tail.
I am above and never beneath.
As Jesus is in Heaven, so AM I in this world!
No weapon formed against me will prosper!
I have the mind of Christ!
My youth is renewed everyday!
I am grateful for a new day!
I am thankful for my vision.
I am thankful for my senses.
I am thankful for my mind.
I am thankful for my body.
I am thankful I made it over all my past storms.
I trample upon lions and cobras and crush them under my feet.
This is the day the Lord has made I will be happy and enjoy it.
I speak back to every circumstance that doesn't line up with my destiny.
There is no condemnation for you who believes in me.
Jesus conquered hell just for me.
I already won because I'm going to Heaven!
My name is written in the Book of Life!
I am making decisions everyday that will lead me to fulfill my destiny.
I am filled with wisdom.
I move in peace and joy no matter the circumstance.
I talk to God about my problems.
God is my best problem solver.
I trust in God.
I invite God to help me with every detail of my life.
I am a warrior!
I may fail, but God picks me back up.
Nothing is to big for God.
Everyday is a new chance to move closer to my destiny.
I learn from my mistakes.
I take action everyday.
I never stop learning with God.
I take care of my body.
I love the journey I am on.
Life is a gift and I'm thankful for every moment and chapter.
Through the highs and lows I trust God.
Abundance is a part of my inheritance.
Great health is a part of my inheritance.
Joy and gratitude is how I rise above every storm.
Jesus died for me to have a great life and bless others.
I am confident, trustworthy, and fearless.
I have a vision for my life.
I am beyond blessed because I am alive.
I guard my heart and mind from things that will tear me down.
God wants me to prosper!
I am faithful and grateful over what God gives me.
God is developing my character so I can handle what I'm asking for.
I ask God to direct all my steps.
I have it in me to reach the potential God set for me.
There is power in my words, so I carefully choose what to say.
God and I, are in a partnership to fulfill my destiny!
I can change the atmosphere with my words.
I am bold as a lion!
I pray all day, everyday.
I am a 1 of 1.
I am unstoppable.
God gave me an assignment, and I will fulfill it.
I take massive action that aligns with my goals.
I am honorable.
I am who God says I am.
I refuse to waste time, energy, or money on things not aligned with my God-given destiny.
It's time to fly like an eagle!
I can never be alone when the Creator of the Universe is at my side.
I have great focus and vision for my life.
God is faithful to all of his promises!
God is willing to bless me bigger than what I think, so I think BIG thoughts.
I love who I am becoming.
I choose to follow God.
I run towards my destiny.
I confidently and joyfully conquer the challenges in front of me.
I walk in integrity in all areas of my life.
I know all my work will bear much fruit.
I am growing with God everyday!
I don't fear the future, God is there too!
My mind is a gift and I guard it with my life.
My mind is alert.
I make great decisions.
I boldly run towards my dreams.
I stay positive no matter how many setbacks occur.
I have a great purpose to fulfill.
God has a great plan for my life.
I go where God says go!
When I follow God's path, goodness will follow me.
I make the right choices at the right time.
I make plans and take action everyday to fulfill them.
My mind is made up, I always find positivity and peace.
I was created to stand out.
I was created to be different than the crowd.
I keep a positive attitude when things don't go my way.
I respond like a winner.
I was born to be a champion.
I am a child of the King.
I am no longer limited in my mind.
New doors of opportunity are always opening.
I am watching my destiny unfold.
I am getting revenge on the enemy.
God's word is stronger than any weapon.
I make wise choices that benefit my future.
I was created to be different than the crowd.
I have great patience and resolve.
I am loved greatly by the Creator of the Universe.
I am a victorious warrior.
God is always preparing the way for me.
I pursue my destiny everyday.
God lives in me!
I praise the Lord for all he has done.
I draw near to God, and He draws near to me.
I always have choices to make so I choose wisely.
God has amazing things in store for me.
Nothing can stop me.
God is my defender and fights my battles.
The time for abundance starts now!
I am showered with favor.
Everything I put my hands to prospers.
I am alive and winning.
I am forever young.
I went through the fire and came out not even smelling like smoke.
I am designed for a great, abundant, and peaceful life.
I do things that help transform people's lives.
I bring value into every project I am part of.
The time is now.
God is with me at this moment.
I will take action on the things I have been putting off.
God's goodness and protection follow me everywhere.
I spread joy and smiles everywhere I go.
I change the atmosphere because God is with me.
I release words of positivity to and over people.
I have contagious faith.
My faith in God is the reason I thrive.
I have power and authority.
Life and Death is in the power of the tongue.
I speak life into my future.
My best days are still to come.
I only speak positive things.
When I pray, heaven is listening.
My words can heal.
I stand on God's promises.
I have no lack in any area.
All I see is abundance.
I am helping others see their new identity in Jesus.
I refuse to lose.
I am a money magnet.
My family is guarded by angels.
I have supernatural provision.
I declare anything blocking my blessings must be removed.
I declare new opportunities are on the way.
I declare my generational curses are now broken.
I meditate on God's promises.
I declare I will receive my full inheritance!
My family walks in peace and wisdom.
Me and My family will serve the Lord.
I speak life and blessing into people around me.
I speak life as a part of my identity.
God is connecting me with the right people.
I don't allow situations to control my emotions.
Even if I don't see a way, doesn't mean God doesn't have a way.
I remove all negative labels and replace them with what I truly am, a masterpiece.
I am loved by the Most High.
I am in alignment with my destiny.
My actions are in alignment with my goals.
My thoughts align with my goals.
Jesus died for me to have a long, joyful, abundant life.
I am healed.
Health and wealth are mine.
Every cell of my body is being renewed everyday.
I remove all doubts with prayer and action.
When I'm focused, I can't be stopped.
I get all the answers I need from the Holy Spirit who lives within me.
My confidence is rising.
I am capable.
I love my unique qualities.
I will not waste today.
My destiny is a canvas, and I am the artist.
I am resilient and I adapt to align with my destiny.
I am grateful for the journey that leads me to my destiny.
I am filled with joy knowing I am following my destined path.
Every day, I move closer to fulfilling my destiny.
I am continuously evolving to meet my destiny.
I am a magnet for experiences that propel me towards my destiny.
I embrace the lessons that guide me towards my destiny.
Every moment is an opportunity to align closer with my destiny.
I am destined to live a life full of passion and purpose.
I surround myself around people and resources that help align me with my destiny.
My destiny is not a matter of chance, it's a matter of choice.
I am courageous in pursuing my destiny.
Every challenge I complete brings me a step closer to my destiny.
My destiny unfolds as I live authentically.
I release fear and embrace the unknown steps of my destiny.
I am destined for greatness and I embrace it fully.
I am actively shaping my destiny with every choice I make.
My actions today are stepping stones towards my ultimate destiny.
I trust in my journey and know I am on the right path.
I trust in the Lord’s plan for my life, knowing He guides my path.
God’s strength empowers me to fulfill my destiny.
I walk by faith, not by sight, aligned with God's purpose.
I am guided by God's wisdom in my decisions towards my destiny.
I embrace the promises of God, aligning my life with His word.
I am patient, knowing God's timing is perfect for my destiny.
I walk in obedience to God, aligning with His divine purpose.
My faith in God opens doors to my destined path.
God’s grace is more than enough for me to reach my destiny.
I am equipped by God to accomplish great things.
I am confident in my God-given abilities to achieve my destiny.
I seek God's kingdom first, trusting all else will align.
I am renewed daily by God’s word, aligning with His will.
I am a co-creator with God in my life’s destiny.
I am constantly growing and learning in God’s wisdom.
I trust in God with all my heart.
I am secure in God’s love, which leads me to my true purpose.
I am in tune with God’s voice, directing me towards my destiny.
I am living proof to God’s grace, living out my divine destiny.
I am chosen by God to fulfill a unique and special destiny.
I love the destiny God has prepared for me.
I am a living example of God’s love, fulfilling my destiny.
I am continuously molded by God to fit my divine purpose.
God’s favor surrounds me as I journey towards my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am stepping into my destiny with courage and strength.
In Jesus' name, I claim victory over every obstacle on my path to destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am empowered to fulfill the purpose for which I was created.
In Jesus' name, I walk in divine alignment, every step ordered towards my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I break free from any chains that hinder my journey to destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am an overcomer, destined to achieve greatness for His glory.
In Jesus' name, I possess the wisdom and insight to navigate my path to destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am surrounded by favor as with a shield on my way to destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am a beacon of light, leading others as I walk in my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I embrace the challenges that refine me for my divine destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am equipped with supernatural strength to conquer my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I rise above doubts and fears, fully assured of my glorious destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am resilient, turning every setback into a setup for my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am blessed with unwavering faith to pursue my God-given destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am a warrior, fearlessly advancing towards my promised destiny.
In Jesus' name, divine connections are established, propelling me into my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am a trailblazer, forging new paths that lead to my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am relentless, never giving up on the pursuit of my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am inspired with creative ideas that catapult me into my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am a champion, crowned with success as I embrace my destiny.
In Jesus' name, every door that leads to my destiny swings open with divine ease.
In Jesus' name, I am a visionary, seeing beyond the now and walking into my destiny.
In Jesus' name, I am unstoppable, charging forward with boldness to seize my destiny.
I am saved by grace through faith, and it is a gift from God.
God’s grace is sufficient for me in every weakness.
I live in the freedom that Christ’s grace has given me.
Through Jesus’ grace, I am forgiven and set free from my past.
I receive grace upon grace every day of my life.
I am covered by the grace of God, and nothing can separate me from His love.
Grace abounds in my life because of Christ’s sacrifice.
I can not earn God’s grace; it is freely given to me through Jesus.
I am a child of God, living under His abundant grace.
God’s grace empowers me to live a righteous life.
In every situation, God’s grace sustains and strengthens me.
I have access to God’s grace at all times through Jesus Christ.
By grace, I am redeemed and made whole.
Jesus’ grace is transforming me daily, making me more like Him.
I stand firm in the grace of God, knowing He has great plans for me.
Because of God’s grace, I live free from guilt and shame.
God’s grace enables me to overcome every challenge I face.
I am filled with grace and peace through Jesus Christ.
God’s grace renews my strength and guides my every step.
I am not defined by my past; I am covered by grace.
Grace enables me to love and forgive others just as Christ loves and forgives me.
I am confident in God's grace to lead me into all truth.
Through Jesus’ grace, I receive peace, joy, and strength each day.
I live in the overflow of God's grace and mercy.
God’s grace allows me to walk in the fullness of His promises.
In Jesus' name, grace rewrites my story, turning trials into testimonies.
I stand firm in Jesus, unshaken by the storms of life.
Jesus empowers me to conquer mountains.
For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing, it is the gift of God.
But God shows his love for us in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
Let us then with confidence draw near to the throne of grace, that we may receive mercy and find grace to help in time of need.
I am constantly receiving and giving grace that God has given me.

But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.' Therefore I will boast all the more gladly of my weaknesses, so that the power of Christ may rest upon me.
So that, as sin reigned in death, grace also might reign through righteousness leading to eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
Out of his fullness we have all received grace in place of grace already given.
For sin will have no dominion over you, since you are not under law but under grace.
God has given me the perfect amount of grace I need for every storm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But to each one of us grace has been given as Christ apportioned it.

declarations.text: I fully embrace God's grace, knowing that I am made right with Him through Jesus, not by my own efforts.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I do not set aside the grace of God, for if righteousness could be gained through the law, Christ died for nothing!

declarations.text: I am justified by God's grace, redeemed through Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am justified by his grace as a gift, through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: God's grace and peace are multiplying in my life as I grow in knowing Him and Jesus my Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May grace and peace be multiplied to you in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord.

declarations.text: Through the blood of Jesus, I have redemption and the forgiveness of my sins, overflowing with His grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of our sins, according to the riches of his grace.

declarations.text: The Lord is gracious and compassionate towards me, full of righteousness and love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is gracious and righteous, our God is full of compassion.

declarations.text: I have received an abundance of grace and the gift of righteousness. Through Jesus, I reign in life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For if by the one man's offense death reigned through the one, much more those who receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness will reign in life through the One, Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: No matter how great the sin, God's grace abounds even more in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But where sin increased, grace increased all the more.

declarations.text: I praise God for His glorious grace, freely given to me in Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: To the praise of his glorious grace, which he has freely given us in the One he loves.

declarations.text: God’s grace overflows in my life, giving me all I need to excel in every thing I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that having all sufficiency in all things at all times, you may abound in every good work.

declarations.text: I am saved and called to live a holy life, not by my works but through God's purpose and grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He has saved us and called us to a holy life—not because of anything we have done but because of his own purpose and grace.

declarations.text: Grace and truth have come into my life through Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the law was given through Moses, grace and truth came through Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I stand firmly in God’s grace through faith and rejoice in the hope of His glory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Through him we have also obtained access by faith into this grace in which we stand, and we rejoice in hope of the glory of God.

declarations.text: My speech is always full of grace, seasoned with wisdom, so I know how to respond to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let your speech always be gracious, seasoned with salt, so that you may know how you ought to answer each person.

declarations.text: I am growing daily in the grace and knowledge of Jesus Christ, and I give Him all the glory!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. To him be glory both now and forever! Amen.

declarations.text: God longs to be gracious to me and shows me His compassion daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord longs to be gracious to you, therefore he will rise up to show you compassion.

declarations.text: I know God because I live in His love, and His love overflows in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love.

declarations.text: God’s grace is more than enough for me, and His power is perfected in my weakness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.

declarations.text: I abide in Jesus, and He abides in me. I bear much fruit by staying connected to Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit by itself, unless it abides in the vine, neither can you, unless you abide in me.

declarations.text: I ask and receive, I seek and find, I knock, and doors are opened to me through God’s grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Ask, and it will be given to you, seek, and you will find, knock, and it will be opened to you.

declarations.text: In me, you will find rest for your soul, for my yoke is easy and my burden is light.
Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
Let not your hearts be troubled. Believe in God, believe also in me.
God’s peace fills my heart and calms my soul, no matter what comes.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I trust in God and He keeps me in perfect peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.

declarations.text: I am calm and peaceful because God is always with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want. He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside still waters, he restores my soul.

declarations.text: I cast all my worries on God and live in His peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

declarations.text: I live in peace, trusting God with all my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.

declarations.text: I have peace because God is in control of every situation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be still and know that I am God.

declarations.text: God’s peace reigns in my heart, no matter what I face.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace.

declarations.text: I remain calm and unshaken, knowing God is my refuge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord gives strength to his people; the Lord blesses his people with peace.

declarations.text: God’s peace guards my heart and mind in every situation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Don’t worry about anything; instead, pray about everything. Tell God what you need, and thank him for all he has done.

declarations.text: I choose peace over fear because God is with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.

declarations.text: I experience peace because I fix my thoughts on what is good and true.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Fix your thoughts on what is true, and honorable, and right, and pure, and lovely, and admirable.

declarations.text: I have peace in my heart because I know God is my provider.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.

declarations.text: I rest in God’s peace and His plans for my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.

declarations.text: I let go of my worries and live in the peace God provides.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.

declarations.text: I live in peace because God is always working for my good.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

declarations.text: I choose to walk in peace and let go of my fears.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

declarations.text: I embrace peace in my heart, knowing God’s love casts out fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear, because fear has to do with punishment.

declarations.text: I live in peace because I trust God with all my burdens.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: God’s peace fills me as I keep my focus on Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.

declarations.text: I have peace knowing that God is always with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is near. Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

declarations.text: I choose peace and forgiveness in my relationships, knowing God forgives me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Bear with each other and forgive one another if any of you has a grievance against someone. Forgive as the Lord forgave you.

declarations.text: I choose to let go of anger and embrace peace and patience.
declarations.bibleVerseText: A hot-tempered person stirs up conflict, but the one who is patient calms a quarrel.

declarations.text: I find peace in God’s presence, and He renews my strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.

declarations.text: I trust God’s perfect will for my life and live in peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God is not a God of disorder but of peace.

declarations.text: I live in peace because I trust God with all my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.

declarations.text: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.
Whoever comes to me I will never cast out.
If you abide in my word, you are truly my disciples, and you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
With man this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.
I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will not walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.
If anyone thirsts, let him come to me and drink. Whoever believes in me, as the Scripture has said, 'Out of his heart will flow rivers of living water.'
Behold, I am with you always, to the end of the age.
Your faith has made you well, go in peace, and be healed of your disease.
In my Father's house are many rooms. If it were not so, would I have told you that I go to prepare a place for you?
I seek wisdom, and God gives it to me generously.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If any of you lacks wisdom, you should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to you.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord and His wisdom directs my path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.

declarations.text: Wisdom brings peace and understanding to my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For wisdom will enter your heart, and knowledge will fill you with joy.

declarations.text: I gain wisdom by listening and learning from others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let the wise listen and add to their learning, and let the discerning get guidance.

declarations.text: God’s wisdom is pure and brings peace to my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the wisdom from above is first of all pure. It is also peace loving, gentle at all times, and willing to yield to others.

declarations.text: I walk with the wise and grow wiser every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Walk with the wise and become wise; associate with fools and get in trouble.

declarations.text: I treasure wisdom and it keeps me safe and secure.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Wisdom will save you from the ways of wicked men, from men whose words are perverse.

declarations.text: I choose wisdom and live with peace and security.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For through wisdom your days will be many, and years will be added to your life.

declarations.text: I honor the Lord, and with wisdom I gain true understanding.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Fear of the Lord is the foundation of true wisdom. All who obey his commandments will grow in wisdom.

declarations.text: I guard my words with wisdom and speak life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The heart of the righteous weighs its answers, but the mouth of the wicked gushes evil.

declarations.text: I seek wisdom in every decision I make, trusting God’s guidance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Teach us to number our days, that we may gain a heart of wisdom.

declarations.text: I value wisdom more than riches or gold.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For wisdom is more precious than rubies, and nothing you desire can compare with her.

declarations.text: I walk in wisdom, avoiding foolishness in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity.

declarations.text: I receive wisdom that leads me to prosperity and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one who finds wisdom, and the one who gets understanding, for the gain from her is better than gain from silver and her profit better than gold.

declarations.text: I ask for wisdom in every situation, knowing God will guide me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The beginning of wisdom is this: Get wisdom. Though it cost all you have, get understanding.

declarations.text: I speak wisely and bring healing to those around me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The tongue of the wise brings healing.

declarations.text: I seek wisdom in God's word, and it leads me to life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord gives wisdom; from his mouth come knowledge and understanding.

declarations.text: I follow the path of wisdom, which leads to honor and success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The wise inherit honor, but fools get only shame.

declarations.text: I am wise and humble, recognizing that wisdom brings success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Pride leads to conflict; those who take advice are wise.

declarations.text: I make wise choices that lead to life and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Wise choices will watch over you. Understanding will keep you safe.

declarations.text: God’s wisdom brings me safety and protection in every situation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Wisdom is a shelter as money is a shelter, but the advantage of knowledge is this: Wisdom preserves those who have it.

declarations.text: I receive wisdom from above, and it guides my heart and actions.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the wisdom from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, open to reason, full of mercy and good fruits, impartial and sincere.

declarations.text: I choose wisdom over wealth, for wisdom is life-giving.
declarations.bibleVerseText: How much better to get wisdom than gold, to get insight rather than silver!

declarations.text: I am wise and slow to speak, knowing my words carry power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The heart of the wise makes his speech judicious and adds persuasiveness to his lips.

declarations.text: I guard my heart with wisdom, for it is the source of my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Above all else, guard your heart, for everything you do flows from it.

declarations.text: Everyone who glorifes himself will be humbled, and he who humbles himself will be glorified.
Fear not, for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
I have come that you may have life, and have it to the full.
You are the light of the world. A city set on a hill cannot be hidden.
I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me.
Truly, truly, I say to you, whoever hears my word and believes him who sent me has eternal life. He does not come into judgment, but has passed from death to life.
Thank you Jesus for Your grace that frees me from all condemnation.
Thank you Jesus for the victory over guilt, won by Your sacrifice.
Thank you Jesus for helping me keep my eyes on your finished work.
Thank you Jesus for setting me free, declaring me righteous in Your sight.
Thank you Jesus for grace that covers my past, empowering my future.
Thank you Jesus for breaking the chains of shame, crowning me with love and mercy.
Thank you Jesus for Your fierce love that defends me against every lie of condemnation.
Thank you Jesus for grace that makes me a new creation, old things have passed away.
Thank you Jesus for the power of Your grace that makes me more than a conqueror.
Thank you Jesus for your gift of righteousness.
Thank you Jesus for the grace that rewrites my story, from condemned to cherished.
Thank you Jesus for the boldness grace gives me to approach Your throne, free of fear.
Thank you Jesus for washing away my sins, leaving no trace of condemnation.
Thank you Jesus for grace that fills me with peace, knowing I am fully loved by You.
Thank you Jesus for the shield of grace that protects me from the arrows of guilt.
Thank you Jesus for the grace that empowers me to live boldly, unashamed of the Gospel.
Thank you Jesus for Your grace that brings light to my darkest moments, removing all shadows of shame.
Thank you Jesus for the grace that proclaims freedom, declaring I am no longer a slave to sin.
Thank you Jesus for your grace that saves me from all my failures.
Thank you Jesus for grace that affirms my identity as Your beloved, in who You are well pleased.
Thank you Jesus for grace that ensures my name is written in the Book of Life, secure and sealed.
Thank you Jesus for grace that calls me to rise, no longer bound by the weight of condemnation.
I am more than a conqueror through Jesus who loves me.
I am the righteousness of God in Christ, justified by faith and walking in peace.
I am redeemed and live in victory through Jesus.
Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.

And Jesus answered them, 'Have faith in God. Truly I tell you, if anyone says to this mountain, ‘Be lifted up and thrown into the sea,’ and does not doubt in their heart but believes that what they say will happen, it will be done for them.'
But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
For we walk by faith, not by sight.
For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God.
If you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain, ‘Move from here to there,’ and it will move. Nothing will be impossible for you.
And Jesus said unto her, Daughter, thy faith hath made thee whole; go in peace, and be whole of thy plague.
Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
For we live by believing and not by seeing.
So faith comes from hearing, and hearing by the word of Christ.
Jesus replied, 'Did I not tell you that if you believe, you will see the glory of God?'
Be on your guard; stand firm in the faith; be courageous; be strong.
For with God nothing shall be impossible.
But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed.
I am grounded in faith, knowing Jesus walks with me daily.
I am strong in my belief because Jesus strengthens me.
I am a child of God, filled with faith through Christ’s love.
I am confident, for Jesus has conquered every fear I may face.
I am filled with peace, trusting in Jesus’ promises over my life.
I am blessed, for my faith in Jesus opens doors of favor.
I am unshakable because my foundation is built on Jesus.
I am joyful, knowing that Jesus is my hope and salvation.
I am fearless, for Jesus has already overcome the world.
I am victorious through faith, for Jesus fights my battles.
I am bold in my faith, for Jesus is the author of my strength.
I am constantly growing, for Jesus leads me in faith each day.
I am surrounded by grace, strengthened by faith in Jesus.
I am empowered, for Christ within me is greater than any challenge.
I am anchored in faith, for Jesus is my rock and my salvation.
Let there be unwavering faith in my heart,  Jesus is my rock.
Let there be courage within me, for Jesus has overcome the world.
Let there be peace that surpasses understanding, grounded in my faith in Christ.
Let there be boldness in my spirit, for Jesus has called me to walk in faith.
Let there be joy in my heart, knowing Jesus is my constant hope.
Let there be strength in my soul, for Christ empowers me daily.
Let there be divine guidance in my life, as I follow Jesus in faith.
Let there be gratitude in my heart, for Jesus has given me the gift of faith.
Let there be resilience within me, for Jesus strengthens me in all things.
Let there be an overflow of hope in my life, rooted in my faith in Christ.
Let there be wisdom in my choices, as Jesus lights my path in faith.
Let there be trust in my heart, for Jesus guides me through every season.
Let there be strength in my walk, knowing Jesus is by my side always.
Let there be healing in my life, as I place my faith in Jesus.
Let there be abundant grace, as I grow stronger in my faith through Christ.
I declare that my faith is strong because Jesus is my anchor.
I declare that I am filled with courage through my faith in Christ.
I declare that Jesus empowers me to overcome all things through faith.
I declare that my faith grows daily as I walk closely with Jesus.
I declare that no fear can hold me because Jesus is my confidence.
I declare that I am victorious through Jesus, who strengthens my faith.
I declare that I live by faith, trusting in Jesus’ perfect plan for me.
I declare that I am fearless in faith because Jesus walks with me.
I declare that Jesus’ love sustains me, building my faith every day.
I declare that my life is filled with hope, rooted in faith in Christ.
I declare that every step I take is guided by faith in Jesus’ promises.
I declare that my heart is at peace, for Jesus is “my strength.
I declare that my faith is unshakable, grounded in Jesus’ love for me.
I declare that I am fearless, knowing Jesus’ power fuels my faith.
I declare that my trust in Jesus deepens daily, trusting in His love for me.
Trust in Me, for I am with you through every step.
Hold on to faith; I am your strength in every season.
Remember, I have overcome the world, so fear not.
Stay close to Me, and I will give you peace beyond understanding.
Believe in Me fully, for I am making all things new in your life.
Lean on Me, for My strength will uphold you.
Have faith, for I am working even when you cannot see it.
Come to Me, and I will restore your spirit.
Trust that My plans for you are good and filled with hope.
Walk in faith, knowing I am leading you to greater things.
Do not be discouraged, for My love is your constant guide.
In your weakness, I am your strength; rely on Me.
Keep your eyes on Me, and you will find peace amidst any storm.
I am here with you always, guiding you with My light.
Have faith, for I am working all things together for your good.
I believe God has wonderful blessings in store for my future.
I believe that every step I take brings me closer to God’s promises.
I believe that God’s plans for me are greater than I can imagine.
I believe God is aligning opportunities for my growth and success.
I believe God’s favor surrounds me as I step into my future.
I believe that God is preparing me for incredible things ahead.
I believe my future is filled with hope and divine possibilities.
I believe God’s hand is guiding me to fulfill my greatest potential.
I believe that God’s blessings are unfolding in my life daily.
I believe God has equipped me for every good thing in my future.
I believe God’s purpose for me is filled with joy, love, and peace.
I believe God is working behind the scenes for my highest good.
I believe that God’s promises over my life will come to pass.
I believe my future is secure in God’s hands, filled with greatness.
I receive whatever I ask for in prayer through faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And whatever you ask in prayer, you will receive, if you have faith.

declarations.text: I walk by faith, trusting in God, not by what I see.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we walk by faith, not by sight.

declarations.text: My faith pleases God, and I believe He rewards those who seek Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But without faith it is impossible to please Him, for he who comes to God must believe that He is, and that He is a rewarder of those who diligently seek Him.

declarations.text: I fight the good fight, will finish the race, and keep my faith strong.
My faith grows as I hear the word of Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So faith comes from hearing, and hearing through the word of Christ.

declarations.text: I am saved by grace through faith, and this is God's gift to me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing, it is the gift of God.

declarations.text: I hold tightly to the hope I confess, knowing God is faithful to His promises.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let us hold fast the confession of our hope without wavering, for He who promised is faithful.

declarations.text: I stand firm in my faith, staying courageous and strong in the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be on guard. Stand firm in the faith. Be courageous. Be strong.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord with all my heart and rely on His understanding, not my own.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the LORD with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding.

declarations.text: With faith, I believe that all things are possible for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you can believe, all things are possible to him who believes.

declarations.text: I can do all things through Him who strengthens me.
I run with endurance, keeping my eyes on Jesus, who perfects my faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And let us run with endurance the race that is set before us, looking unto Jesus, the founder and perfecter of our faith.

declarations.text: My faith assures me of the things I hope for and gives me confidence in what I cannot see.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.

declarations.text: As a child of God, I overcome the world, and my victory is in my faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For everyone who has been born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world—our faith.

declarations.text: By believing, I will see the glory of God in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jesus said to her, 'Did I not tell you that if you believed you would see the glory of God?'

declarations.text: I pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, and gentleness in all I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you, O man of God, flee these things and pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, gentleness.

declarations.text: I fight the good fight of faith and hold on to the eternal life to which I am called.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Fight the good fight of the faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called when you made your good confession in the presence of many witnesses.

declarations.text: I look to Jesus, who endured the cross for the joy set before Him and is now seated at God's right hand.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Looking to Jesus, the founder and perfecter of our faith, who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is seated at the right hand of the throne of God.

declarations.text: I take up the shield of faith and extinguish every fiery dart of the enemy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In all circumstances take up the shield of faith, with which you can extinguish all the flaming darts of the evil one.

declarations.text: And whatever you ask in prayer, you will receive, if you have faith.
For nothing will be impossible with God.
I am blessed because I believe that God will fulfill His promises to me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is she who believed that there would be a fulfillment of what was spoken to her from the Lord.

declarations.text: With God, all things are possible, no matter how impossible they seem to man.
declarations.bibleVerseText: With man it is impossible, but not with God. For all things are possible with God.

declarations.text: Whatever I ask for in prayer, I believe I have received it, and it is mine.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore I tell you, whatever you ask in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it will be yours.

declarations.text: Through faith in Christ Jesus, I am a child of God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are all sons of God through faith in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I confidently approach God, knowing that He hears me when I ask according to His will.
declarations.bibleVerseText: This is the confidence we have in approaching God: that if we ask anything according to His will, He hears us.

declarations.text: My faith makes me whole, and I walk in health and healing, following Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And Jesus said to him, 'Go your way, your faith has made you well.' And immediately he recovered his sight and followed him on the way.

declarations.text: I am justified by faith, and through Jesus, I have peace with God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, since we have been justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: Jesus said to him, 'If you can! All things are possible for one who believes.'
And this is not your own doing, it is the gift of God, not a result of works, so that no one may boast.

I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
Do not be afraid, only believe.
I am victorious through Christ who strengthens me.
I am more than a conqueror in all challenges through Him who loves me.
I am walking by faith, not by sight, trusting in God's plan.
I am standing firm in faith, unshaken by the trials of this world.
I am shielded by God's power, my faith extinguishing all the flaming arrows of the evil one.
I am strong in the Lord and in the power of His might, fully armored for battle.
I am a warrior of light, fearlessly advancing the kingdom of God.
I am fearless, for my God is with me wherever I go.
I am rooted and established in love, comprehending the vastness of Christ's love for me.
I am not anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, I present my requests to God.
I am not conformed to this world, but transformed by the renewal of my mind.
I am running with endurance the race set before me, fixing my eyes on Jesus, the author and perfecter of my faith.
I am bearing fruit in every season, my leaf does not wither, and in everything I do, I prosper.
I am the righteousness of God in Christ Jesus
I am casting all my anxieties on Him, for He cares for me.
I pray without ceasing, giving thanks in all circumstances.
I am building my life on the solid rock of Christ's teachings, unshaken by the storms.
I am wearing the full armor of God, able to stand against the attacks of the devil.
I am overcoming evil with good, not repaying evil for evil, but giving thought to do what is honorable in the sight of all.
I am a doer of the Word, acting on what I believe.
I am the temple of the Holy Spirit, living a life led by the Spirit of God.
I am walking in the Spirit, producing the fruit of the Spirit in all aspects of my life.
I am keeping my mind stayed on Jesus, trusting in Him.
For it is by believing in your heart that you are made right with God, and it is by openly declaring your faith that you are saved.

And Jesus answered them, 'Truly, I say to you, if you have faith and do not doubt, you will not only do what has been done to the fig tree, but even if you say to this mountain, 'Be taken up and thrown into the sea,' it will happen.'
My faith and loyalty is in God alone.
If you openly declare that Jesus is Lord and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.
Jesus is my vine, and in Him, I am nourished and fruitful. Apart from Him, I am nothing, but with Him, I flourish.
Jesus is the architect of my future, holding plans of hope and promise. In Him, I find my purpose and my destiny.
Jesus is my unwavering connection to the Father, when I believe and pray, all things are possible.
Jesus is my bridge from darkness to light, assuring me eternal life through faith.
I am a warrior of imagination.
I am a champion of innovation.
I am a vessel of inspiration.
I am wielding the brush of creativity to paint my destiny.
I am a conqueror of limitations.
I am full of originality, illuminating the path of creativity with my unique vision.
I sculpt masterpieces from the clay of my creativity.
I am a visionary leader.
I am a creator of possibilities.
I am a champion of expression, articulating truth through the language of my creativity.
I am a pioneer of ideas, exploring uncharted territories with the compass of my creativity.
I am a full of innovation.
I am a master of transformation, reshaping reality with the magic of my creativity.
I am a visionary architect.
I am a creator of beauty, infusing the world with the radiance of my creative spirit.
I dream the impossible and making it real through my creativity.
I am a master of thinking outside the box.
I am a bright spark of ideas.
I am a creative explorer, trying out new ways to do things.
I am a creative genius.
I Trust in the LORD with all my heart and lean not on my own understanding.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
The LORD is on my side, I will not fear. What can man do to me?
I am blessed because I trust in the Lord and place my confidence in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But blessed is the one who trusts in the LORD, whose confidence is in him.

declarations.text: The Lord is faithful; He establishes me and protects me from the evil one.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the LORD is faithful. He will establish you and guard you against the evil one.

declarations.text: God's grace is more than enough for me, and His power is made perfect in my weakness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in your weakness.

declarations.text: My faith gives me assurance in what I hope for and confidence in what I cannot see.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now faith is being sure we will get what we hope for. It is being sure of what we cannot see.

declarations.text: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
I am strong and courageous, for the Lord my God is with me.
I am an overcomer because greater is He that is in me than he that is in the world.
I am confident in God's promises, persuaded that He is able.
I am blessed, for I trust in the Lord and have made Him my hope and confidence.
I am bold, for the righteous are as bold as a lion.
I walk by faith, not by sight.
I am anchored in Christ, the solid rock on which I stand.
I am confident to face challenges, God is my refuge and strength.
I am sure-footed, for God makes my steps firm.
I am secure in God's calling and purpose for my life.
With Jesus, I am fearless about what the future holds.
I am confident because I am in Christ, my eternal rock.
I am empowered to confidently pursue my dreams with Jesus.
God’s love for me is my confidence in an uncertain world.
I am more than a conqueror in all situations with Jesus.
In me, you may have peace. In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart, I have overcome the world.
I am with you always, even unto the end of the world.
Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God, trust also in me.
Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.
I have given you authority to trample on snakes and scorpions and to overcome all the power of the enemy, nothing will harm you.
Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. Each day has enough trouble of its own.
With man this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.
Peace I leave with you, my peace I give you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
Everyone who hears these words of mine and puts them into practice is like a wise man who built his house on the rock.
Do not be afraid, just believe.
I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.
Truly I tell you, if you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain, 'Move from here to there,' and it will move. Nothing will be impossible for you.
In Jesus' name, I walk in unwavering confidence, knowing I am more than a conqueror.
In Jesus' name, I stand tall facing every challenge head-on.
In Jesus' name, I am fearless, for His perfect love casts out all fear.
In Jesus' name, I step into my calling with boldness, guided by His wisdom.
In Jesus' name, I face life's battles with a warrior's confidence, assured of victory.
In Jesus' name, I am secure, my confidence anchored in His eternal love.
In Jesus' name, I move mountains with faith-filled confidence, nothing is impossible.
In Jesus' name, I am unafraid to shine, my confidence a reflection of His glory.
In Jesus' name, I approach every opportunity with confidence, for He opens every door.
In Jesus' name, I am grounded in the truth, my confidence unswayed by the world.
The LORD is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
Cast all your anxiety on Him because He cares for you.
Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
The LORD is my shepherd, I lack nothing. He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters, he refreshes my soul.
Peace I leave with you, my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
So do not fear, for I am with you, do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him, so that you may overflow with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain, for the old order of things has passed away.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the LORD your God goes with you, he will never leave you nor forsake you.
The righteous cry out, and the LORD hears them, he delivers them from all their troubles.
But the Lord stood at my side and gave me strength.
Weeping may stay for the night, but rejoicing comes in the morning.
My comfort in my suffering is this: Your promise preserves my life.
Come to me, all who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
My peace I give to you, not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart, I have overcome the world.
I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will not walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.
If you abide in me, and my words abide in you, ask whatever you wish, and it will be done for you.
Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God, trust also in me.
I have told you these things so that in me you may have peace.
Ask and it will be given to you, seek and you will find, knock and the door will be opened to you.
Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
I am the resurrection and the life. Whoever believes in me, though he die, yet shall he live.
Everyone who lives and believes in me shall never die. Do you believe this?
I am the bread of life, whoever comes to me shall not hunger, and whoever believes in me shall never thirst.
Whoever follows me will not walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.
Your faith has made you well, go in peace.
Take heart, daughter, your faith has healed you.
Do not be anxious about your life, what you will eat or what you will drink, nor about your body, what you will put on.
I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
I am the vine, you are the branches. Whoever abides in me and I in him, he it is that bears much fruit, for apart from me you can do nothing.
I tell you, my friends, do not be afraid of those who kill the body and after that can do no more.
Are not five sparrows sold for two pennies? Yet not one of them is forgotten by God.
Indeed, the very hairs of your head are all numbered. Don't be afraid, you are worth more than many sparrows.
I am with you always, to the very end of the age. Do not be afraid.
My joy I give to you, that your joy may be full. Your sorrow will turn into joy.
You are precious in my sight. I have called you by name, you are mine.
I work hard and receive the rewards of my efforts.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Work brings profit, but mere talk leads to poverty!

declarations.text: I honor the Lord with my wealth and He blesses me abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your wealth, with the firstfruits of all your crops; then your barns will be filled to overflowing, and your vats will brim over with new wine.

declarations.text: I seek wisdom, and with it comes wealth and honor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Wisdom offers you long life in her right hand, and riches and honor in her left.

declarations.text: God's blessings bring abundance into my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord makes a person rich, and he adds no sorrow with it.

declarations.text: I trust in God's endless supply for my every need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I am growing in prosperity through God's grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

declarations.text: I am surrounded by God's favor and abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: God's abundance flows into every area of my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will open the heavens, the storehouse of his bounty, to send rain on your land in season and to bless all the work of your hands.

declarations.text: I honor God with my wealth and receive His blessings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your wealth, with the firstfruits of all your crops; then your barns will be filled to overflowing, and your vats will brim over with new wine.

declarations.text: God provides me with wisdom to create and sustain wealth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: By wisdom a house is built, and through understanding it is established; through knowledge its rooms are filled with rare and beautiful treasures.

declarations.text: I trust God's plan for my prosperity and well-being.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

declarations.text: God blesses me with an abundant life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I came that they may have life and have it abundantly.

declarations.text: I receive God's peace and prosperity in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord gives his people strength. The Lord blesses them with peace.

declarations.text: I am grateful for the wealth that God provides.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion, and through us your generosity will result in thanksgiving to God.

declarations.text: I am a channel for God's prosperity to flow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.

declarations.text: God empowers me to succeed and prosper.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord your God will make you most prosperous in all the work of your hands and in the fruit of your womb, the young of your livestock and the crops of your land.

declarations.text: God's grace abounds, bringing me prosperity in all things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that always having all sufficiency in everything, you may have an abundance for every good deed.

declarations.text: I live in God's abundance and receive His bountiful blessings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The generous will themselves be blessed, for they share their food with the poor.

declarations.text: God desires for me to live in abundance and fullness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.

declarations.text: God's plans for me include prosperity and hope.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

declarations.text: The Lord blesses me and gives me an abundant life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord makes a person rich, and he adds no sorrow with it.

declarations.text: God provides for all my needs and more.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: God's abundance is available to me every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

declarations.text: God delights in my prosperity and success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.

declarations.text: God's favor brings me prosperity and joy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: God grants me the power to prosper and thrive.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But remember the Lord your God, for it is he who gives you the ability to produce wealth, and so confirms his covenant, which he swore to your ancestors, as it is today.

declarations.text: God's grace overflows in my life, bringing abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

declarations.text: God opens doors to prosperity and success for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will open the heavens, the storehouse of his bounty, to send rain on your land in season and to bless all the work of your hands.

declarations.text: I am planted in God's abundance and flourish.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The righteous will flourish like a palm tree, they will grow like a cedar of Lebanon; planted in the house of the Lord, they will flourish in the courts of our God.

declarations.text: God's prosperity flows freely into my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.

declarations.text: God desires to fill my life with good things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You open your hand and satisfy the desires of every living thing.

declarations.text: God's abundance is my inheritance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion, and through us your generosity will result in thanksgiving to God.

declarations.text: God's love for me brings prosperity and well-being.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Beloved, I pray that you may prosper in all things and be in health, just as your soul prospers.

declarations.text: I command abundance to flow into my life by the power of God's Word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord makes a person rich, and he adds no sorrow with it.

declarations.text: I declare that prosperity is mine through Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I speak abundance into every area of my life by faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

declarations.text: I command the doors of prosperity to open for me now.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will open the heavens, the storehouse of his bounty, to send rain on your land in season and to bless all the work of your hands.

declarations.text: I declare God's abundance is mine today and always.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd; I have all that I need.

declarations.text: I speak blessings and wealth into my life with confidence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Death and life are in the power of the tongue, and those who love it will eat its fruits.

declarations.text: I command God's favor to bring me prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: I declare that the riches of God's kingdom are mine.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Seek the Kingdom of God above all else, and he will give you everything you need.

declarations.text: I command financial breakthroughs to manifest in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap.

declarations.text: I speak abundance and success into existence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion, and through us your generosity will result in thanksgiving to God.

declarations.text: I declare that wealth flows into my life effortlessly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The wealth of the rich is their fortified city; they imagine it a wall too high to scale.

declarations.text: I command all forms of prosperity to come to me now.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And whatever you ask in prayer, you will receive, if you have faith.

declarations.text: I speak God's favor and abundance over my finances.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that having all sufficiency in all things at all times, you may abound in every good work.

declarations.text: I declare God's provision overflows in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My cup overflows with blessings.

declarations.text: I command prosperity to take root in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But they delight in the law of the Lord, meditating on it day and night. They are like trees planted along the riverbank, bearing fruit each season. Their leaves never wither, and they prosper in all they do.

declarations.text: I work hard and receive the rewards of my efforts.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Work brings profit, but mere talk leads to poverty!

declarations.text: I honor the Lord with my wealth and He blesses me abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your wealth, with the firstfruits of all your crops; then your barns will be filled to overflowing, and your vats will brim over with new wine.

declarations.text: I am diligent in my work, and I prosper because of it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lazy people want much but get little, but those who work hard will prosper.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord, and He makes me flourish like a tree by the river.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But blessed are those who trust in the Lord and have made the Lord their hope and confidence. They are like trees planted along a riverbank, with roots that reach deep into the water.

declarations.text: God blesses the work of my hands and increases my wealth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord brings wealth, without painful toil for it.

declarations.text: I give generously and receive abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and you will receive. Your gift will return to you in full—pressed down, shaken together to make room for more, running over, and poured into your lap.

declarations.text: I reap generously because I sow generously.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Remember this: Whoever sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and whoever sows generously will also reap generously.

declarations.text: I am faithful with little, and God blesses me with much.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you are faithful in little things, you will be faithful in large ones.

declarations.text: I am rich in every way and generous on every occasion.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion.

declarations.text: I seek the kingdom of God first, and everything else is added to me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

declarations.text: I obey God's word, and He prospers me in all I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Study this Book of Instruction continually. Meditate on it day and night so you will be sure to obey everything written in it. Only then will you prosper and succeed in all you do.

declarations.text: God is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd; I have all that I need.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord and He fills my life with abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The righteous will flourish like a palm tree, they will grow like a cedar of Lebanon.

declarations.text: God gives me the power to create wealth and establish His covenant.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But remember the Lord your God, for it is he who gives you the ability to produce wealth.

declarations.text: I am blessed and fruitful in everything I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be blessed when you come in and blessed when you go out.

declarations.text: I am like a tree planted by streams of water, bearing fruit in season.
declarations.bibleVerseText: That person is like a tree planted by streams of water, which yields its fruit in season and whose leaf does not wither—whatever they do prospers.

declarations.text: I bring my tithes to God, and He opens the windows of heaven for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Bring all the tithes into the storehouse, so there will be enough food in my Temple. If you do, says the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, I will open the windows of heaven for you. I will pour out a blessing so great you won’t have enough room to take it in!

declarations.text: The Lord makes me rich and He is my source of happiness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord makes a person rich, and he adds no sorrow with it.

declarations.text: I delight in God's Word, and He gives me the desires of my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.

declarations.text: I am generous, and I am blessed with even more.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The generous will prosper; those who refresh others will themselves be refreshed.

declarations.text: I trust in God, and He makes me successful.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Commit your actions to the Lord, and your plans will succeed.
