declarations.text: I have everything I need because God supplies all my needs.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd; I lack nothing.

declarations.text: I sow in faith and reap a harvest of blessings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Those who plant in tears will harvest with shouts of joy.

declarations.text: I am bearing fruit in every season, my leaf does not wither, and whatever I do prospers.
I am joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.
I am casting all my anxieties on Him, for He cares for me deeply.
I am standing on the promises of God, my solid foundation in every storm.
I am a child of God, fearfully and wonderfully made, destined for great things.
I am clothed with strength and dignity, and I laugh without fear of the future.
I am set free, for whom the Son sets free is free indeed.
I am more than a conqueror through Him who loves me.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.
In Jesus' name, I am freed from every chain of addiction.
In Jesus' name, I claim victory over the temptations that seek to bind me.
In Jesus' name, I walk in freedom, my spirit unshackled and strong.
In Jesus' name, I am healed from the inside out, addiction has no hold on me.
In Jesus' name, I embrace a life of sobriety, filled with His peace and joy.
In Jesus' name, I stand resilient against the allure of addiction.
In Jesus' name, I am empowered to break free from the cycles that entrap me.
In Jesus' name, I find strength in my moments of weakness, rising above addiction.
In Jesus' name, every craving and desire that does not serve me is dissolved.
In Jesus' name, I am a conqueror, my past does not define my future.
In Jesus' name, I reclaim my life, steering it towards purpose and fulfillment.
In Jesus' name, I am renewed, my body, mind, and spirit aligned with His will.
In Jesus' name, I embrace the support and love that surround me on this journey.
In Jesus' name, I am filled with the Holy Spirit.
In Jesus' name, I am surrounded by angels, guarding me in moments of temptation.
In Jesus' name, I am a testament to God's power, showcasing His ability to redeem.
In Jesus' name, my testimony will inspire others, proving that no chain is too strong for God.
In Jesus' name, I celebrate each day of freedom, a warrior victorious in His love.
My body is the temple of the Holy Spirit, and I honor God with my body because He paid a high price for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Don’t you realize that your body is the temple of the Holy Spirit, who lives in you and was given to you by God? You do not belong to yourself, for God bought you with a high price. So you must honor God with your body.

declarations.text: I live in the light, avoiding sinful actions and allowing every part of me to belong to the Lord Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We must act all the time as if it were day. Keep away from wild parties and do not be drunk. Keep yourself free from sex sins and bad actions. Do not fight or be jealous. Let every part of you belong to the Lord Jesus Christ. Do not allow your weak thoughts to lead you into sinful actions.

declarations.text: I confess my sins, and God is faithful to forgive and cleanse me from all wickedness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If we claim we have no sin, we are only fooling ourselves and not living in the truth. But if we confess our sins to him, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all wickedness.

declarations.text: God comforts me in all my troubles, so I can comfort others with the same comfort He has given me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He comforts us in all our troubles so that we can comfort others. When they are troubled, we will be able to give them the same comfort God has given us.

declarations.text: I conquer evil by doing good and refuse to let evil control me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Don’t let evil conquer you, but conquer evil by doing good.

declarations.text: The Holy Spirit produces love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness, and self-control in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Holy Spirit produces this kind of fruit in our lives: love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness, and self-control. There is no law against these things!

declarations.text: God is faithful, and He provides a way out of every temptation I face, so I can endure.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The temptations in your life are no different from what others experience. And God is faithful. He will not allow the temptation to be more than you can stand. When you are tempted, he will show you a way out so that you can endure.

declarations.text: My grace is all you need. My power works best in weakness.
I can do all things because Christ gives me the strength.
I am not a slave to addiction because the Lord has set me free.
I am not dominated by any substance because God has called me to live a life of self-control.
I am an overcomer by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of my testimony.
I am free from addiction, for where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
I am more than a conqueror through Christ who loves me.
I am dead to sin and alive to God in Christ Jesus.
I am not conformed to this world, but am transformed by the renewal of my mind.
I walk by the Spirit, and I will not gratify the desires of the flesh.
The old has passed away, I am a new creation in Christ.
I am a child of God.
I am a temple of the Holy Spirit.
I am victorious in Christ Jesus.
I am set free from sin.
I am not enslaved to anything or anyone but Christ.
I am able to stand firm against the devil's schemes.
I am filled with the Spirit.
I am covered by God’s grace.
I am delivered by Christ’s grace from every addiction.
I am empowered by the Holy Spirit to conquer addiction.
By faith in Christ, I am set free.
I am healed and restored throughJesus.
Every day in Christ is victory and freedom from addiction.
I have set you free, and whom the Son sets free is free indeed.
My grace is sufficient for you, even in your weakness and struggles.
I am with you in every temptation, and I provide a way out when you feel trapped.
You are more than a conqueror through me. Addiction has no power over you.
I restore the years the locusts have eaten, including the years lost to addiction.
I am your refuge in times of craving and temptation. Run to me, and I will protect you.
Do not be discouraged by setbacks, I am patient and persistent in delivering you.
You are more than your struggles, you are a child of God, who I love greatly.
I am constantly renewed in the spirit of my mind, embracing the life God has for me.
I am victorious in every battle, for the battle belongs to the Lord.
In Jesus' name, I conquer every fear, standing strong in the face of adversity.
In Jesus' name, I am more than a conqueror.
In Jesus' name, I am secure in His promise to never leave me.
I embrace challenges with confidence, knowing Jesus is with me.
In Jesus' name, fear is defeated, and I am cloaked in unshakeable peace.
In Jesus' name, every shadow of fear is dispelled by the brilliance of His presence.
In Jesus' name, my spirit is strengthened, immune to the arrows of fear.
In Jesus' name, I stand firm, my faith unmovable as a rock.
God has given me power, love, and a sound mind. I have no fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.

declarations.text: The Lord is my light and salvation, I have no reason to fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The LORD is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear? The LORD is the stronghold of my life—of whom shall I be afraid?

declarations.text: I do not fear because God is with me and strengthens me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So do not fear, for I am with you, do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

declarations.text: God has delivered me from all my fears.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I sought the LORD, and he answered me, he delivered me from all my fears.

declarations.text: Even in the darkest times, I fear no evil because God is with me and comforts me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me, your rod and your staff, they comfort me.

declarations.text: God’s perfect love drives out all fear from my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear, because fear has to do with punishment. The one who fears is not made perfect in love.

declarations.text: I am strong and courageous because the Lord is always with me and will never forsake me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the LORD your God goes with you, he will never leave you nor forsake you.

declarations.text: I have the peace of Christ in my heart, and I refuse to be troubled or afraid.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.

declarations.text: When I am afraid, I put my trust in you.
Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
I cast all my anxiety on God because He cares for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Cast all your anxiety on him because He cares for you.

declarations.text: The Lord is with me, and I will not be afraid. No one can harm me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The LORD is with me, I will not be afraid. What can mere mortals do to me?

declarations.text: I speak strength to my heart and declare, 'Do not fear, for my God will come to save me.'
declarations.bibleVerseText: Say to those with fearful hearts, 'Be strong, do not fear, your God will come, he will come with vengeance, with divine retribution he will come to save you.'

declarations.text: God keeps me in perfect peace because my mind is steadfast, and I trust in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.

declarations.text: I do not fear, for the Lord has redeemed me and called me by name; I belong to Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But now, this is what the LORD says— he who created you, Jacob, he who formed you, Israel: 'Do not fear, for I have redeemed you, I have summoned you by name, you are mine.'

declarations.text: I am strong and courageous, for the Lord my God is with me wherever I go.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid, do not be discouraged, for the LORD your God will be with you wherever you go.

declarations.text: Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding, in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
I trust in the Lord, and He keeps me safe from fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Fear of man is a dangerous trap, but whoever trusts in the LORD is kept safe.

declarations.text: I am a child of God and no longer a slave to fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For you did not receive a spirit that makes you a slave again to fear, but you received the Spirit of sonship. And by him we cry, 'Abba, Father.'

declarations.text: I stand firm in my faith with courage and strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be on your guard, stand firm in the faith, be courageous, be strong.

declarations.text: The Lord is faithful, He strengthens and protects me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.

declarations.text: I will not fear, for the Lord has redeemed me and calls me His own.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Fear not, for I have redeemed you, I have called you by name, you are mine.

declarations.text: God is my refuge and strength, always ready to help me in trouble.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

declarations.text: God’s angels surround me, and He delivers me from harm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The angel of the LORD encamps around those who fear him, and he delivers them.

declarations.text: Even if I suffer for doing what is right, I am blessed and have no reason to fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But even if you should suffer for what is right, you are blessed. 'Do not fear their threats, do not be frightened.'

declarations.text: I do not fear because the Lord is with me and will rescue me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be afraid of them, for I am with you and will rescue you, declares the LORD.

declarations.text: Even in troubles, the Lord delivers me from them all.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The righteous person may have many troubles, but the LORD delivers him from them all.

declarations.text: But Jesus immediately said to them: 'Take courage! It is I. Don't be afraid.'
Be strong and very courageous. Be careful to obey all the law my servant Moses gave you, do not turn from it to the right or to the left, that you may be successful wherever you go.
Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
Don’t fear, my child, I will always have your back.
In this world, you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.
Peace I leave with you, my peace I give you.
Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.
Do not be afraid, only believe.
I am the vine, you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit, apart from me you can do nothing.
I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.
My grace is your fortress, under my wings, you'll find refuge from fear.
Stand firm in your faith, and let not fear sway you, I am with you.
As I stilled the sea, I will quiet your fears, trust in my mighty power.
Do not fear the unknown, I go before you always.
I am your shield and great reward, fear has no place in my kingdom.
In every trial, remember I am with you, the mighty Savior who delights in you.
My love for you will cast out all fear, abide in my love and be fearless.
I am your stronghold in times of trouble, why should you fear?
Trust in my unfailing love, and fear will lose its grip on you.
I have declared victory over death, let not fear of the end dismay you.
My power is made perfect in your weakness, in me, you can bravely face all fears.
With my love as your shield, no fear can stand against you.
I am the Prince of Peace, in my presence, fear has no dominion.
Let your heart be steadfast, for my love for you is unchanging and mighty.
Fear not the darkness, for I am the Light that overcomes it.
I am your rock, your fortress, and your deliverer, in me, you should fear nothing.
Fear not, for I hold the keys to life and death.
Thank you, Jesus, for never leaving me.
Thank you, Jesus, for your peace that surpasses all understanding.
Thank you, Jesus, for being my light in the darkest times.
Thank you, Jesus, for the courage to face every battle.
Thank you, Jesus, for the victory over fear through your love.
Thank you, Jesus, for your strength when I am weak.
Thank you, Jesus, for the armor of God that protects me.
Thank you, Jesus, for the power to tread on serpents and scorpions.
Thank you, Jesus, for making me more than a conqueror.
Thank you, Jesus, for your unfailing presence in every storm.
Thank you, Jesus, for setting me free from the chains of fear.
Thank you, Jesus, for being my refuge and fortress.
Thank you, Jesus, for the assurance that you are always with me.
Thank you, Jesus, for your promise of peace in my heart.
Thank you, Jesus, for the boldness to stand firm in faith.
Thank you, Jesus, for your mighty hand that guides and protects me.
Thank you, Jesus, for calming the seas of my life and silencing my fears.
Thank you, Jesus, for the confidence to walk in your ways.
Thank you, Jesus, for the joy that overcomes the spirit of fear.
Thank you, Jesus, for the freedom to live courageously in your name.
Thank you, Jesus, for your word that is a lamp unto my feet.
Thank you, Jesus, for your blood that has won the victory over every fear.
Thank you, Jesus, for the promise of eternal life, removing the fear of death.
Thank you, Jesus, for the grace that empowers me to live fearlessly.
Thank you, Jesus, for being my solid rock, unshaken by the storm.
Through Jesus, I am completely forgiven and made new.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

declarations.text: I am forgiven, and my sins are removed as far as the east is from the west.
declarations.bibleVerseText: As far as the east is from the west, so far has he removed our transgressions from us.

declarations.text: I am washed clean by the blood of Jesus and fully forgiven.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, in accordance with the riches of God’s grace.

declarations.text: I have received God’s grace and forgiveness through faith in Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith—and this is not from yourselves, it is the gift of God.

declarations.text: Believing in Jesus, I am not condemned but forgiven and free.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: Jesus took my sins on Himself, so I am forgiven and healed.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He himself bore our sins in his body on the cross, so that we might die to sins and live for righteousness; by his wounds you have been healed.

declarations.text: God’s forgiveness brings me peace and reconciliation with Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God was reconciling the world to himself in Christ, not counting people’s sins against them.

declarations.text: I am forgiven and set free by the grace of God through Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: It is for freedom that Christ has set us free.

declarations.text: God remembers my sins no more because I am forgiven in Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I will forgive their wickedness and will remember their sins no more.

declarations.text: Through faith in Jesus, I receive complete forgiveness and eternal life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Everyone who believes in him receives forgiveness of sins through his name.

declarations.text: God’s mercy forgives my sins and gives me new life in Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Because of the Lord’s great love we are not consumed, for his compassions never fail. They are new every morning.

declarations.text: I am justified and forgiven through faith in Jesus Christ alone.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I believe in Jesus, and my sins are forgiven, bringing me eternal life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

declarations.text: In Christ, I am forgiven and made righteous in the eyes of God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God made him who had no sin to be sin for us, so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.

declarations.text: I am cleansed and forgiven by God’s grace through the sacrifice of Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blood of Jesus, his Son, purifies us from all sin.

declarations.text: I am forgiven, and my sins are covered by God’s grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are those whose transgressions are forgiven, whose sins are covered.

declarations.text: God has forgiven my sins and lifted the burden of guilt from me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one whose transgressions are forgiven, whose sins are covered.

declarations.text: I am free from the power of sin and death through Christ’s forgiveness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Because through Christ Jesus the law of the Spirit who gives life has set you free from the law of sin and death.

declarations.text: God’s grace abounds in my life, bringing me forgiveness and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But where sin increased, grace increased all the more.

declarations.text: Through Jesus, I am forgiven, and I have peace with God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: Jesus’ death on the cross gives me complete forgiveness and eternal life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

declarations.text: I am forgiven through the grace and mercy of God in Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But because of his great love for us, God, who is rich in mercy, made us alive with Christ even when we were dead in transgressions—it is by grace you have been saved.

declarations.text: I am free from condemnation because I am forgiven in Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I am forgiven, and God’s mercy has given me a new life in Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He saved us, not because of righteous things we had done, but because of his mercy. He saved us through the washing of rebirth and renewal by the Holy Spirit.

declarations.text: I am forgiven, and God’s grace is greater than all my sins.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Where sin increased, grace increased all the more.

declarations.text: In Jesus' name, I am a new creation, old things passed away, living in His mercy.
I forgive others, knowing my heavenly Father also forgives me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For if you forgive other people when they sin against you, your heavenly Father will also forgive you.

declarations.text: I forgive endlessly, just as Jesus teaches me to forgive over and over again.
declarations.bibleVerseText: 'Lord, how many times shall I forgive my brother or sister who sins against me? Up to seven times?' Jesus answered, 'I tell you, not seven times, but seventy-seven times.'

declarations.text: I am kind and compassionate, forgiving others as Christ forgave me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.

declarations.text: When I confess my sins, God is faithful to forgive and purify me from all unrighteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

declarations.text: I forgive others just as the Lord has forgiven me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Bear with each other and forgive one another if any of you has a grievance against someone. Forgive as the Lord forgave you.

declarations.text: I release any unforgiveness so that God may forgive me as well.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And when you stand praying, if you hold anything against anyone, forgive them, so that your Father in heaven may forgive you your sins.

declarations.text: I am forgiven much, and in response, I love greatly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, I tell you, her many sins have been forgiven—as her great love has shown. But whoever has been forgiven little loves little.

declarations.text: I forgive others, knowing that God forgives me in return.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But if you do not forgive others their sins, your Father will not forgive your sins.

declarations.text: I am blessed because my sins are forgiven and covered by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one whose transgressions are forgiven, whose sins are covered.

declarations.text: God shows me mercy and forgiveness, even when I have rebelled against Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: To the Lord our God belong mercy and forgiveness, though we have rebelled against him.

declarations.text: Through Jesus, I have redemption and forgiveness by the riches of God's grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, in accordance with the riches of God’s grace.

declarations.text: I turn to the Lord, and He freely pardons me with His mercy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let the wicked forsake their ways and the unrighteous their thoughts. Let them turn to the Lord, and he will have mercy on them, and to our God, for he will freely pardon.

declarations.text: God delights in showing mercy and forgives all my sins.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Who is a God like you, who pardons sin and forgives the transgression of the remnant of his inheritance? You do not stay angry forever but delight to show mercy.

declarations.text: God remembers my sins no more, for I am forgiven through Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then he adds: 'Their sins and lawless acts I will remember no more.'

declarations.text: Thank you Jesus for washing away my sins and renewing my spirit.
Thank you Jesus for your boundless mercy that embraces me unconditionally.
Thank you Jesus for the cross, where your love and forgiveness met.
Thank you Jesus for breaking the chains of my past and setting me free.
Thank you Jesus for turning my mistakes into testimonies of your grace.
Thank you Jesus for the promise of a new beginning every day through your forgiveness.
Thank you Jesus for the joy and freedom that come from being forgiven.
Thank you Jesus for your unfailing love that forgives and restores.
Thank you Jesus for healing the wounds of my past through your forgiving touch.
Thank you Jesus for the privilege to stand cleansed and forgiven before you.
Thank you Jesus for your open arms, always ready to forgive and welcome me back.
Thank you Jesus for empowering me to live a life that reflects your forgiveness.
Thank you Jesus for the assurance that no sin is too great for your forgiveness.
And when you stand praying, if you hold anything against anyone, forgive them, so that your Father in heaven may forgive you your sins.
If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.
Do not judge, and you will not be judged. Do not condemn, and you will not be condemned. Forgive, and you will be forgiven.
Don’t fear, my child, I have forgiven you, walk in freedom.
Your sins are washed away, you are new in my eyes.
I remember your sins no more, you are free from your past.
My grace covers all your mistakes, you are loved beyond measure.
In my forgiveness, find the strength to start anew each day.
Let go of your burdens, I have taken them upon myself.
You are not defined by your faults, my love redefines you.
Come to me with your regrets, I'll replace them with my peace.
My blood was shed for your freedom, embrace the life I give.
You are precious to me, I have called you by name, forgiven.
Rise up, forgiven one, your faith has made you whole.
Release your guilt, I've embraced you with my redeeming love.
Your heart is my home, let my forgiveness dwell within you.
Walk in the liberty I've given you, your chains are broken.
I see your repentance, I respond with boundless forgiveness.
Fear not your flaws, my love is greater than all sin.
I have called you worthy, not because of you, but because of my sacrifice.
You are not held captive by your errors, my forgiveness sets you free.
In your weakness, my forgiveness is your strength and shield.
Let my forgiveness wash over you like a cleansing stream.
Embrace my forgiveness, and let it propel you into a future of hope.
In peace I will lie down and sleep, for God alone keeps me safe.
Jesus is my shield and safe place where no evil will prosper.
In Jesus' name, I am surrounded by a wall of fire, no harm can touch me.
In Jesus' name, I stand fearless, for His mighty angels guard me in all my ways.
In Jesus' name, I walk in safety, for He commands His protection over my life.
In Jesus' name, I am shielded from the storms, finding refuge under His wings.
In Jesus' name, no enemy attacks can succeed, I am covered by His blood.
In Jesus' name, I live in peace, He is my fortress and my deliverer.
In Jesus' name, I am invincible, God's favor is like a shield around me.
In Jesus' name, I journey with confidence, for His hand of protection is upon me.
In Jesus' name, I embrace each day, secure in the shadow of the Almighty.
In Jesus' name, I am steadfast, unmovable, under the umbrella of God's care.
In Jesus' name, I am safe from all danger, for He is my rock and my salvation.
In Jesus' name, I live boldly, knowing that His protection is my inheritance.
In Jesus' name, I face challenges head-on, cloaked in the armor of God.
In Jesus' name, I march forward in victory.
In Jesus' name, I repel every threat, anchored in the strength of His promise.
In Jesus' name, I am resilient, every trial a testimony to His protective grace.
In Jesus' name, I tread fearlessly, each step ordained and protected by Him.
In Jesus' name, I am enveloped in peace, a fortress built by His unfailing love.
I am safe and protected at all times.
God is always watching over me and my family.
I have 10,000 angels watching over me.
God is my defender and fights my battles.
I can sleep in safety because the Lord is watching over me.
The Lord keeps watch over you as you come and go, both now and forever.
The Lord will rescue me from every evil attack.
My angels surround me wherever I go.
The Lord will keep me from all harm.
The Lord will fight for me, I only need to trust.
God is faithful, and he will strengthen me and protect me from the evil one.
I am safe when I run to the Lord.
I make the Lord my refuge, the Most High is my shelter, no evil will conquer me, no plague will come near my home.
I will take refuge in the shadow of your wings until the disaster has passed.
In peace I will lie down and sleep, for you alone, Lord, make me live in safety.
The righteous person may have many troubles, but the Lord delivers him from them all.
The Lord is good, a refuge in times of trouble. He cares for those who trust in him.
The righteous cry out, and the Lord hears them, he delivers them from all their troubles. The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
You are my refuge and my shield, I have put my hope in your word.
The LORD is my rock, my fortress, and my savior, my God is my rock, in whom I find protection. He is my shield, the power that saves me, and my place of safety.
Those who live in the shelter of the Most High will find rest in the shadow of the Almighty.
But the Lord is faithful, he will strengthen you and guard you from the evil one.
For you are my hiding place, you protect me from trouble. You surround me with songs of victory.
God is our refuge and strength, always ready to help in times of trouble.
I believe God’s healing power is restoring health to every part of my body.
I believe my organs are being strengthened and renewed by God’s grace.
I believe God’s love is healing every cell, tissue, and organ in my body.
I believe divine health flows through my veins, bringing strength and vitality.
I believe God’s peace is restoring my mind, body, and soul to wholeness.
I believe my heart beats with strength and perfect rhythm through God’s power.
I believe God is repairing and renewing every muscle, nerve, and joint in my body.
I believe my immune system is being strengthened and protected by God.
I believe God’s healing touch is bringing balance and vitality to my entire body.
I believe my lungs are filled with the breath of life from God, bringing me strength.
I believe every organ is functioning perfectly under the care of God’s grace.
I believe God is filling me with energy, vitality, and a renewed spirit of health.
I believe God’s healing presence restores my body to complete health.
I believe my mind is calm, and my body is in perfect alignment through God’s power.
I believe God’s light is illuminating every part of my body, bringing healing and peace.
I declare my body must align with divine health and wholeness.
I declare every cell in my body functions perfectly as God intended.
I declare that my body is renewed, restored, and filled with life.
I declare that God’s healing power flows through every part of me.
I declare my heart beats strong and steady, aligned with God’s strength.
I declare my mind is clear, my spirit is strong, and my body is whole.
I declare my immune system is fortified, healthy, and resilient.
I declare my muscles, bones, and joints are aligned with vitality and strength.
I declare my digestive system is healthy, strong, and perfectly functioning.
I declare my lungs are filled with the breath of life, bringing me energy and peace.
I declare that God’s peace flows through my mind and brings healing to my body.
I declare every organ is functioning in perfect harmony, aligned with God’s design.
I declare my nervous system is calm, balanced, and perfectly aligned.
I declare that my body is continually renewed and strengthened by God’s love.
I declare that I am vibrant, energetic, and full of life as God intended.
In Jesus' name, my body is healed, for He has paid the price for my health.
In Jesus' name, I conquer every disease, as His power flows through me.
In Jesus' name, I stand strong and healthy, redeemed from all sickness.
In Jesus' name, every part of my body is restored to perfect health.
In Jesus' name, no illness can remain in me, for His sacrifice made me whole.
In Jesus' name, I declare my immune system strong and disease-free.
In Jesus' name, my body is cleansed, renewed, and protected from all harm.
In Jesus' name, every cell in my body is revitalized and filled with life.
In Jesus' name, I am free from pain and filled with divine health.
In Jesus' name, I am whole, as He has defeated every illness on my behalf.
In Jesus' name, I receive complete healing and strength in every organ.
In Jesus' name, I declare victory over every disease and ailment.
In Jesus' name, I am restored, and my body flourishes with health.
In Jesus' name, I live free from disease, as His healing power covers me.
In Jesus' name, my body thrives with health, for His sacrifice set me free.
He gives power to the weak and strength to the powerless.
Beloved, I pray that you may prosper in all things and be in health, just as your soul prospers.
He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
But I will restore you to health and heal your wounds, declares the Lord.
The Lord sustains them on their sickbed and restores them from their bed of illness.
I will take away sickness from among you.
He sent out his word and healed them, snatching them from the door of death.
The Lord gives strength to his people; the Lord blesses his people with peace.

My son, pay attention to what I say; turn your ear to my words. Do not let them out of your sight, keep them within your heart; for they are life to those who find them and health to one’s whole body.
Jesus went through all the towns and villages, teaching in their synagogues, proclaiming the good news of the kingdom and healing every disease and sickness.
And the prayer of faith shall save the sick, and the Lord shall raise him up.
He forgives all my sins and heals all my diseases.
Then your light will break forth like the dawn, and your healing will quickly appear; then your righteousness will go before you, and the glory of the Lord will be your rear guard.
I am the Lord who heals you.
He personally carried our sins in his body on the cross so that we can be dead to sin and live for what is right. By his wounds you are healed.
Receive my peace, for I am renewing every part of you.
Trust in me, for I am bringing wholeness and strength to your body.
Let go of fear; my love is restoring your health completely.
Rest in me, for I am filling you with vibrant health and energy.
I am with you, healing every part of you from within.
Receive my strength, for I am renewing your mind, body, and spirit.
I am touching your life with health and filling you with peace.
Feel my love restoring every cell and bringing life to every organ.
I am lifting every burden, bringing freedom and healing to your body.
I am here, giving you strength and health that cannot be shaken.
Rest in my care, for I am restoring you to complete health.
Know that my healing power flows through you, bringing new life.
I am covering you with healing grace; receive my perfect peace.
Take heart, for I am with you, bringing you joy, strength, and health.
Feel my presence within you, restoring and renewing your whole being.
The LORD keeps you from all harm and watches over your life. The LORD keeps watch over you as you come and go, both now and forever.
No weapon formed against me will prosper, and every tongue which rises against me I will condemn.
The LORD is good, a strong refuge when trouble comes. He is close to those who trust in him.
The angel of the LORD encamps around those who fear him, and he rescues them.
The name of the LORD is a strong fortress, the godly run to him and are safe.
For he will order his angels to protect you wherever you go.
Don’t be afraid, for I am with you. Don’t be discouraged, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you. I will hold you up with my victorious right hand.
So be strong and courageous! Do not be afraid and do not panic before them. For the LORD your God will personally go ahead of you. He will neither fail you nor abandon you.
My victory and honor come from God alone. He is my refuge, a rock where no enemy can reach me.
The LORD himself will fight for you. Just stay calm.
But you, O LORD, are a shield around me, you are my glory, the one who holds my head high.
He will cover you with his feathers. He will shelter you with his wings. His faithful promises are your armor and protection.
The LORD is a shelter for the oppressed, a refuge in times of trouble.
Give your burdens to the LORD, and he will take care of you. He will not permit the godly to slip and fall.
Though I walk in the midst of trouble, you preserve my life. You stretch out your hand against the anger of my foes, with your right hand you save me.
You are my hiding place, you protect me from trouble. You surround me with songs of victory.
Those who live in the shelter of the Most High will find rest in the shadow of the Almighty.
He guards the paths of the just and protects those who are faithful to him.
For he will rescue you from every trap and protect you from deadly disease.
The LORD is my strength and my shield, my heart trusts in him, and he helps me. My heart leaps for joy, and with my song I praise him.
Thank you Jesus for never leaving me.
Thank you Jesus for being my refuge, where I find peace in the storm.
Thank you Jesus for your faithful watch over my life, day and night.
Thank you Jesus for your promise to be with me, a constant guardian.
Thank you Jesus for the safety of your name, a strong tower I run to.
Thank you Jesus for surrounding me with your presence, a wall of fire.
Thank you Jesus for delivering me from the traps and dangers unseen.
Thank you Jesus for your faithfulness, my armor in every trial.
Thank you Jesus for your mighty hand that upholds and defends me.
Thank you Jesus for the security found in your everlasting arms.
Thank you Jesus for your power that no enemy can withstand.
I am safe because God is always watching over me.
I am not afraid because God is my helper.
I am confident because God is with me all the time.
I am never alone because God is always by my side.
I am secure because God is stronger than anything.
I am fearless because God takes away my worries.
I am watched over because God sees everything.
I am trusting because I know God is in control.
Don't fear, my child, I am your shield and protector.
Trust in me, I will keep you safe in my loving arms.
I am with you always, watching over you with care.
Let not your heart be troubled, my peace I give to you.
In every storm, find refuge in my unending love.
Fear has no place in you, for I am your strength.
I have overcome the world, in me, you will find victory.
Believe in my promise to protect and guide you every day.
I am your fortress, nothing can harm you under my watch.
Walk in faith, knowing I am your ever-present guardian.
Find comfort in my care, for I hold you in my hands.
I am your rock, a firm place to stand when life shakes.
Under my wings, you'll find shelter and peace.
Call on me in trouble, I will be there to rescue you.
My love for you is a fortress, it keeps fear at bay.
You are never alone, my presence surrounds you always.
In me, you have a safe haven, a place to rest your worries.
My power is your covering, a mighty shield around you.
Lean on me, I will uphold you with my righteous hand.
My promises are your armor, keeping you secure in battle.
I am the light that guides you through darkness, fearlessly.
My grace is your shield, defending you from every harm.
Rest in my promise of protection, I am always with you.
I am on the right path, guided by Jesus to my best future.
I am ready for great things, with God's help leading the way.
I am getting stronger every day, facing challenges with courage.
I am never alone, Jesus is with me, helping me win my battles.
I am sure of who I am, a child of God, meant for amazing things.
I am finding my way, step by step, with Jesus by my side.
I am brave, not afraid to go after my dreams, with God's strength.
I am full of hope, looking forward to the good things God has planned.
I am growing, learning more each day on my way to where I'm meant to be.
I am loved by God, and this love guides me to my true purpose.
I am protected on my journey, with angels watching over me.
I am praying with power, my words reaching heaven as I chase my destiny.
I am not stopped by hard times, they only make me stronger.
I am holding on, never giving up, because I know I'm meant for more.
I am blessed with God's wisdom, making smart choices on my path.
I am drawing good things into my life, ready for the opportunities God sends.
I am getting better every day, shaped by every experience God gives me.
I am seeing the big picture, dreaming big with faith in Jesus.
Thank you Jesus for guiding my steps towards my destiny.
Thank you Jesus for the strength to pursue my purpose with courage.
Thank you Jesus for the vision to see my path and the faith to follow it.
Thank you Jesus for being my compass, leading me to my destiny.
Thank you Jesus for the victories that pave the way to my future.
Thank you Jesus for the wisdom to make choices that align with my calling.
Thank you Jesus for the doors you open, each leading me closer to my destiny.
Thank you Jesus for the challenges that shape me for my destiny.
Thank you Jesus for the assurance that my destiny is secured in you.
Thank you Jesus for the journey that refines me for my purpose.
I am joyful and patient, trusting in God's timing for my life.
I am special, made by God to do great things and make a difference.
I am moving forward, one step at a time, towards the great plan God has for me.
Thank you Jesus for the promise that I am more than a conqueror.
Thank you Jesus for the passion to pursue my destiny with all my heart.
Thank you Jesus for the endurance to keep going, even when the road is tough.
Thank you Jesus for the people you place in my life to guide and support me.
Thank you Jesus for the joy that comes from walking in my divine purpose.
Thank you Jesus for the grace that covers me as I move towards my destiny.
Thank you Jesus for the peace that assures me I am on the right path.
Thank you Jesus for the moments of clarity that confirm my calling.
Thank you Jesus for every step forward, each one a victory towards my destiny.
Thank you Jesus for the strength to overcome all obstacles.
Thank you Jesus for the confidence to claim the future you've prepared for me.
Thank you Jesus for the courage to dream big and follow your plan for my life.
Thank you Jesus for the fulfillment that comes from living out my destiny.
Thank you Jesus for the promise of your presence every step towards my destiny.
Give thanks to the LORD and proclaim his greatness. Let the whole world know what he has done.
Devote yourselves to prayer with an alert mind and a thankful heart.
I will praise you, LORD, with all my heart, I will tell of all the marvelous things you have done.
And give thanks for everything to God the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Give thanks to the LORD, for he is good! His faithful love endures forever.
Always be joyful. Never stop praying. Be thankful in all circumstances, for this is God’s will for you who belong to Christ Jesus.
And let the peace that comes from Christ rule in your hearts. For as members of one body you are called to live in peace. And always be thankful.
Don’t worry about anything, instead, pray about everything. Tell God what you need, and thank him for all he has done.
Enter his gates with thanksgiving, go into his courts with praise. Give thanks to him and praise his name.
I will thank the LORD because he is just, I will sing praise to the name of the LORD Most High.
Let them praise the LORD for his great love and for the wonderful things he has done for them.
Then I will praise God’s name with singing, and I will honor him with thanksgiving.
Whatever is good and perfect is a gift coming down to us from God our Father, who created all the lights in the heavens. He never changes or casts a shifting shadow.
But thank God! He gives us victory over sin and death through our Lord Jesus Christ.
Since we are receiving a Kingdom that is unshakable, let us be thankful and please God by worshiping him with holy fear and awe.
Let us come to him with thanksgiving. Let us sing Psalm of praise to him.
I am thankful that Jesus Christ, is the same yesterday, today, and forever.
I am thankful in all circumstances.
I am filled with gratitude for the unchanging nature of God.
I am blessed and will praise the Lord all my life.
I am always giving thanks to God for everything.
I am grateful for God's steadfast love that endures forever.
I am grateful that my name is written in the book of life.
Thank you Jesus for everything you do for me.
Thank you Jesus for your unwavering presence in my life.
Thank you Jesus for the strength you provide in challenging times.
Thank you Jesus for the peace that surpasses understanding.
Thank you Jesus for the joy that fills my heart each day.
Thank you Jesus for the victories, both seen and unseen.
Thank you Jesus for your grace that covers every mistake.
Thank you Jesus for the wisdom you freely give when I ask.
Thank you Jesus for the healing power of your touch.
Thank you Jesus for the doors you open in my life.
Thank you Jesus for the protection you provide every day.
Thank you Jesus for the love that surrounds me constantly.
Thank you Jesus for the hope that keeps me moving forward.
Thank you Jesus for the faith to believe in what I cannot see.
Thank you Jesus for the blessings you pour into my life.
Thank you Jesus for the courage to face every challenge.
Thank you Jesus for the comfort you provide.
Thank you Jesus for the laughter and moments of happiness.
Thank you Jesus for the people you've placed in my life.
Thank you Jesus for the beauty of your creation I see every day.
Thank you Jesus for the lessons learned in both success and failure.
Thank you Jesus for your sacrifice, making a way for me.
Thank you Jesus for the purpose and calling you've placed on my life.
Thank you Jesus for the moments of clarity and divine insight.
Thank you Jesus for the provision and resources you supply.
Thank you Jesus for the rest and renewal you offer my soul.
Thank you Jesus for the freedom found in your forgiveness.
Thank you Jesus for the adventure of walking in faith with you.
Thank you Jesus for your promise to never leave or forsake me.
Thank you Jesus for the eternal life and hope you offer.
Thank you Jesus for your guiding light in the darkest times.
Thank you Jesus for your unfailing love that uplifts me daily.
Thank you Jesus for the privilege of prayer and direct access to you.
Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
In all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go, I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.
The LORD will guide you always, he will satisfy your needs in a sun-scorched land and will strengthen your frame.
Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
He guides the humble in what is right and teaches them his way.
Whether you turn to the right or to the left, your ears will hear a voice behind you, saying, 'This is the way, walk in it.'
For this God is our God for ever and ever, he will be our guide even to the end.
Show me your ways, LORD, teach me your paths.
Guide me in your truth and teach me, for you are God my Savior, and my hope is in you all day long.
He will not let your foot slip—he who watches over you will not slumber.
The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way.
Commit to the LORD whatever you do, and he will establish your plans.
But when he, the Spirit of truth, comes, he will guide you into all the truth.
Lead me, LORD, in your righteousness because of my enemies—make your way straight before me.
The LORD is my shepherd, I lack nothing. He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters.
You guide me with your counsel, and afterward you will take me into glory.
Teach me to do your will, for you are my God, may your good Spirit lead me on level ground.
May the favor of the Lord our God rest on us, establish the work of our hands for us—yes, establish the work of our hands.
Trust in the LORD and do good, dwell in the land and enjoy safe pasture.
I will lead the blind by ways they have not known, along unfamiliar paths I will guide them, I will turn the darkness into light before them and make the rough places smooth.
Keep this Book of the Law always on your lips, meditate on it day and night, so that you may be careful to do everything written in it. Then you will be prosperous and successful.
May he give you the desire of your heart and make all your plans succeed.
Listen to advice and accept discipline, and at the end you will be counted among the wise.
The heart of man plans his way, but the LORD establishes his steps.
Trust in Me, I will direct your paths to righteousness.
Follow Me, and I will lead you through life's journey.
Lean not on your understanding, My wisdom will guide you.
I am the light, let Me illuminate your path in darkness.
Listen for My voice, I will whisper the way to go.
In uncertainty, seek Me, I will provide clarity and peace.
Let Me be your shepherd, leading you to green pastures.
I will light your lamp, darkness will not overcome you.
Call upon Me in times of trouble, I will show you the way out.
Abide in Me, and I will guide you in all truth and wisdom.
My words are a lamp to your feet, walk in My teachings.
I will guide you with My eye, keep your focus on Me.
Do not fear the unknown, My hand will lead you safely.
Seek My kingdom first, and all things will be directed to you.
My Spirit will guide you into all truth, trust in His promptings.
I will make your paths straight, walk in faith, not by sight.
Submit your plans to Me, and I will ensure their success.
I am the Good Shepherd, follow Me for guidance and protection.
With Me as your guide, you will never walk in darkness.
I will teach you and instruct you in the way you should go.
My plans for you are good, trust Me to lead you to your destiny.
I am always before you, I will show you the path of life.
In every decision, consult Me, I will give you wise counsel.
My guidance is a gift, receive it with an open heart.
I will guide you to peace and fulfillment, rest in My will.
Thank you Jesus for never leaving me, always guiding my steps.
Thank you Jesus for lighting my path in times of darkness.
Thank you Jesus for the wisdom to navigate life's challenges.
Thank you Jesus for leading me with your truth and love.
Thank you Jesus for your voice that directs me when I'm lost.
Thank you Jesus for the confidence your guidance gives me.
Thank you Jesus for showing me the way to victory and success.
Thank you Jesus for your Spirit that counsels me in every decision.
Thank you Jesus for your promises that light up my journey.
Thank you Jesus for being my shepherd, leading me to safety.
Thank you Jesus for the peace that comes from following you.
Thank you Jesus for the strength to follow your path courageously.
Thank you Jesus for your unfailing direction in my life's journey.
Thank you Jesus for guiding me through storms with your steady hand.
Thank you Jesus for the clarity and purpose your guidance brings.
Thank you Jesus for leading me towards a future filled with hope.
Thank you Jesus for the moments of divine insight and revelation.
Thank you Jesus for your hand that guides me to greatness.
Thank you Jesus for securing my place in heaven, where victory is eternal.
Thank you Jesus for the promise of heaven, where every tear will be wiped away.
Thank you Jesus for the path You've paved to heaven, triumphing over the grave.
Thank you Jesus for the crown of life waiting in heaven, a reward for the faithful.
Thank you Jesus for your compass that always points me to truth.
I am unstoppable.
God gave me an assignment, and I will fulfill it.
I take massive action that aligns with my goals.
I refuse to waste time, energy, or money on things not aligned with my God-given destiny.
It's time to fly like an eagle!
I can never be alone when the Creator of the Universe is at my side.
I have great focus and vision for my life.
There is no condemnation for me because I belong to Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So now there is no condemnation for those who belong to Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: When I confess my sins, God is faithful to forgive and cleanse me from all wickedness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If we confess our sins to him, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all wickedness.

declarations.text: God has removed my sins as far as the east is from the west.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He has removed our sins as far from us as the east is from the west.

declarations.text: God has blotted out my sins and will never remember them again.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I—yes, I alone—will blot out your sins for my own sake and will never think of them again.

declarations.text: I have sinned and fallen short, but I receive God’s grace in my weakness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For everyone has sinned, we all fall short of God’s glorious standard.

declarations.text: I am a new creation in Christ. My old life is gone, and a new life has begun!
declarations.bibleVerseText: This means that anyone who belongs to Christ has become a new person. The old life is gone, a new life has begun!

declarations.text: Do not dwell on past mistakes, I offer you forgiveness and a fresh start.
I do not condemn you, go and sin no more, for I am with you.
My grace is greater than your sins, trust in my forgiveness.
You are a new creation in me, let go of guilt and embrace my love.
In me, there is no condemnation, find freedom from sin-consciousness.
I bore your sins on the cross, you are forgiven and free.
I love you despite your flaws, do not carry the burden of guilt.
Your past does not define you, I offer you a future of hope and grace.
I have paid the price for your sins, accept my forgiveness and live in freedom.
I am the way to righteousness, do not carry the weight of guilt any longer.
Your sins are forgiven, do not let guilt rob you of my peace and joy.
I have redeemed you with my precious blood, leave guilt behind and follow me.
The battle is the Lord's.
Do not worry about your life, what you will eat or drink, or about your body, what you will wear. Is not life more than food, and the body more than clothes?
I can do everything through Christ, who gives me strength.

declarations.bibleVerseText: God is my refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
declarations.text: I am strong and safe because God is always with me.

declarations.bibleVerseText: Cast all your anxiety on him because He cares for you.
declarations.text: I release my worries to God, who cares deeply for me.
I am strong in God’s power and overcome every challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I can do everything through Christ, who gives me strength.

declarations.text: God strengthens me for every battle I face.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The LORD is my strength and my defense; he has become my salvation.

declarations.text: I am more than a conqueror through Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

declarations.text: The battle belongs to the Lord, and He fights for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The LORD will fight for you; you need only to be still.

declarations.text: I overcome every obstacle with God’s power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.

declarations.text: God’s strength is made perfect in my weakness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.'

declarations.text: I am fearless because God is with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the LORD your God will be with you wherever you go.

declarations.text: God equips me with everything I need for victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now may the God of peace... equip you with everything good for doing his will.

declarations.text: I stand firm in faith, knowing God will deliver me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be on your guard; stand firm in the faith; be courageous; be strong.

declarations.text: Through faith, I have the victory that overcomes the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For every child of God defeats this evil world, and we achieve this victory through our faith.

declarations.text: I will not fear, for the Lord is with me in battle.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God.

declarations.text: I overcome evil by standing in God’s righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.

declarations.text: The Lord arms me with strength for the battles ahead.
declarations.bibleVerseText: It is God who arms me with strength and keeps my way secure.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord and will not be shaken.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly he is my rock and my salvation; he is my fortress, I will not be shaken.

declarations.text: I am protected under God’s mighty hand.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Humble yourselves, therefore, under God’s mighty hand, that he may lift you up in due time.

declarations.text: The Lord strengthens me in every trial.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.

declarations.text: God makes me victorious through Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But thanks be to God! He gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I do not grow weary, for God renews my strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary.

declarations.text: I walk by faith, not by sight, knowing God guides me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we live by faith, not by sight.

declarations.text: I am victorious because God’s love surrounds me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the LORD your God is the one who goes with you to fight for you against your enemies to give you victory.

declarations.text: With God, I am unshakeable, standing firm in trials.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Cast your cares on the LORD and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

declarations.text: I am not afraid of the future because God strengthens me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I can do all things through him who strengthens me.

declarations.text: I overcome fear with God’s perfect love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear.

declarations.text: I am equipped by God to withstand every trial.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Finally, be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power. Put on the full armor of God, so that you can take your stand against the devil’s schemes.

declarations.text: I am victorious because God’s power lives within me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you belong to God, my dear children. You have already won a victory over those people, because the Spirit who lives in you is greater than the spirit who lives in the world.
The LORD is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
declarations.text: God is near me, healing my heart and lifting my spirit.

declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
declarations.text: God has a plan for my life, filled with hope and purpose.

declarations.bibleVerseText: We are hard pressed on every side, but not crushed, perplexed, but not in despair.
declarations.text: Even in tough times, I am not defeated; I remain hopeful.

declarations.bibleVerseText: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me, your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
declarations.text: I have no fear because God is always guiding and protecting me.
God is always with me and will never leave me. I will not be afraid.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The LORD himself goes before you and will be with you, he will never leave you nor forsake you. Do not be afraid, do not be discouraged.

declarations.text: I find new strength in the Lord and will not grow weary.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles, they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.

declarations.text: I am strong and courageous because God is always with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the LORD your God goes with you, he will never leave you nor forsake you.

declarations.text: I have the peace of Christ, and my heart is not troubled or afraid.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.

declarations.text: When I am weary, I come to Jesus and find rest.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: I do not worry, but pray and present my requests to God with thanks.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

declarations.text: The Lord is faithful. He strengthens and protects me from evil.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord with all my heart and rely on His wisdom, not my own.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.

declarations.text: God is my hiding place, and He protects me from trouble.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are my hiding place, you will protect me from trouble and surround me with songs of deliverance.

declarations.text: God’s grace is enough for me. His power is made perfect in my weakness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.

declarations.text: God has given me a spirit of power, love, and a sound mind, not fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.

declarations.text: I am strong in the Lord and in His mighty power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power.

declarations.text: I have peace in Jesus, and though I face troubles, I take heart because He has overcome the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.

declarations.text: Though I face many troubles, the Lord rescues me each time.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The righteous person faces many troubles, but the LORD comes to the rescue each time.

declarations.text: I have overwhelming victory through Christ, who loves me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, despite all these things, overwhelming victory is ours through Christ, who loved us.

declarations.text: God is with me through every challenge, and I will not be overwhelmed.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When you pass through the waters, I will be with you, and through the rivers, they shall not overwhelm you, when you walk through fire you shall not be burned, and the flame shall not consume you.

declarations.text: I face trouble in this world, but I take heart because Jesus has overcome it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.

declarations.text: I find joy in trials, knowing they strengthen my faith and build perseverance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Consider it pure joy, my brothers and sisters, whenever you face trials of many kinds, because you know that the testing of your faith produces perseverance.

declarations.text: Nothing can separate me from God's love in Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I am convinced that neither death nor life, neither angels nor demons, neither the present nor the future, nor any powers, neither height nor depth, nor anything else in all creation, will be able to separate us from the love of God that is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

declarations.text: I cast my cares on the Lord, and He sustains me through every challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Cast your cares on the LORD and he will sustain you, he will never let the righteous be shaken.

declarations.text: God works all things for my good because I love Him and am called to His purpose.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

declarations.text: The troubles I face now are preparing me for the great things God has for me forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The little troubles we suffer now for a short time are making us ready for the great things God is going to give us forever.

declarations.text: In every challenge, remember, I am with you, offering my strength.
Fear not, for I have overcome the world to bring you peace.
Cast your burdens on me, and I will sustain you through hard times.
Let not your heart be troubled, my grace is sufficient for you.
In your weakness, my power is made perfect, lean on me.
Trust in me with all your heart, I will direct your paths.
I am your refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
When you pass through the waters, I will be with you.
Do not be afraid, I am your shield, your very great reward.
I will never leave you nor forsake you, you are not alone.
Believe in me, and rivers of living water will flow from within you.
My peace I give to you, let not your hearts be troubled.
Be of good cheer, I have overcome the world for you.
In me, you may have peace, take heart, I have overcome your troubles.
I am the light of the world, whoever follows me will not walk in darkness.
Ask, and it will be given to you, seek, and you will find, knock, and the door will be opened.
I will give you the keys of the Kingdom of Heaven, whatever you bind on earth shall be bound in heaven.
With faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain, 'Move,' and it will move.
I am the way, the truth, and the life, follow me for guidance and salvation.
I have called you by name, you are mine. When you go through deep waters, I will be with you.
Take heart, for I have the power to heal and to save.
Remember, I am at your side, even to the end of the age.
Thank you Jesus for never leaving me, especially in the hardest times.
Thank you Jesus for being my strength when I feel weak.
Thank you Jesus for turning my trials into triumphs.
Thank you Jesus for the peace you provide in the midst of storms.
Thank you Jesus for the courage to face every challenge.
Thank you Jesus for guiding me through dark valleys to victory.
Thank you Jesus for the lessons learned and the growth gained in hard times.
Thank you Jesus for being my refuge, where I find safety and comfort.
Thank you Jesus for every moment you carried me when I couldn't walk.
Thank you Jesus for your unwavering faithfulness in every season.
Thank you Jesus for the hope that shines even in the darkest times.
Thank you Jesus for the joy that comes after enduring hard times.
Thank you Jesus for renewing my strength and setting my path straight.
Thank you Jesus for the promise of a brighter tomorrow.
Thank you Jesus for the grace that sustains me through every trial.
Thank you Jesus for the victory over every battle I face.
Thank you Jesus for the light of your love in the darkest times.
Thank you Jesus for the comfort of your presence in times of sorrow.
Thank you Jesus for the wisdom to navigate through life's challenges.
Thank you Jesus for your healing touch in times of brokenness.
Thank you Jesus for the freedom found in overcoming life's hurdles.
Thank you Jesus for your unfailing love that empowers me to persevere.
Thank you Jesus for the assurance that with you, I can overcome anything.
Thank you Jesus for the resilience you build in me through hard times.
Thank you Jesus for your constant guidance out of the storm into calm.
By Jesus’ stripes, I am healed, and my body is whole.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But he was pierced for our transgressions, he was crushed for our iniquities; the punishment that brought us peace was on him, and by his wounds we are healed.

declarations.text: Jesus brings me health and healing; I refuse to be moved by symptoms.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

declarations.text: I walk in divine health because Jesus has made me whole.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Dear friend, I pray that you may enjoy good health and that all may go well with you, even as your soul is getting along well.

declarations.text: No matter what I feel, I declare Jesus as my healer.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise the Lord, my soul, and forget not all his benefits—who forgives all your sins and heals all your diseases.

declarations.text: Jesus gives me strength and renews my body daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.

declarations.text: I trust in Jesus, and His healing power flows through me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But for you who revere my name, the sun of righteousness will rise with healing in its rays. And you will go out and frolic like well-fed calves.

declarations.text: I reject sickness and stand in Jesus’ promise of abundant health.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.

declarations.text: My body is healed by the power of Jesus, no matter what I feel.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He sent out his word and healed them; he rescued them from the grave.

declarations.text: I speak life over my body because Jesus has given me victory over sickness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I will restore health to you, and your wounds I will heal, declares the Lord.

declarations.text: I am filled with health because Jesus lives in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For in him we live and move and have our being.

declarations.text: I have faith in Jesus’ healing touch, and my body responds in health.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jesus said to her, 'Daughter, your faith has healed you. Go in peace and be freed from your suffering.'

declarations.text: The life of Jesus brings me strength and healing every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit of God, who raised Jesus from the dead, lives in you; and just as God raised Christ Jesus from the dead, he will give life to your mortal bodies by this same Spirit living within you.

declarations.text: I walk in the fullness of health because Jesus is my healer.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely he took up our pain and bore our suffering.

declarations.text: Jesus’ power overcomes every sickness and pain in my body.
declarations.bibleVerseText: By his power God raised the Lord from the dead, and he will raise us also.

declarations.text: I live in divine health because Jesus has made me whole.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But Jesus looked at them and said, 'With man this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.'

declarations.text: In Christ, I have perfect health, and sickness has no power over me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You restored me to health and let me live. Surely it was for my benefit that I suffered such anguish.

declarations.text: No physical symptom can steal the health Jesus gave me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But he took our illnesses and bore our diseases.

declarations.text: I speak health into my body, knowing Jesus already paid for my healing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And the prayer offered in faith will make the sick person well; the Lord will raise them up.

declarations.text: Jesus fills me with strength and health in every part of my body.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord stood at my side and gave me strength.

declarations.text: I walk in divine health because Jesus is alive in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I am the Lord who heals you.

declarations.text: My body is healthy because Jesus’ life flows through me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord sustains them on their sickbed and restores them from their bed of illness.

declarations.text: I declare healing over every area of my life, for Jesus has made me whole.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Is anyone among you sick? Let them call the elders of the church to pray over them and anoint them with oil in the name of the Lord.

declarations.text: I am healed in Jesus’ name, and no sickness can remain in my body.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lord, my God, I called to you for help, and you healed me.

declarations.text: I reject sickness and declare that Jesus’ health is mine.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

declarations.text: Jesus is my healer, and I am fully restored to health.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then your light will break forth like the dawn, and your healing will quickly appear.

declarations.text: In Jesus' name, I am healed completely, feeling strong and healthy.
In Jesus' name, my whole body works perfectly.
In Jesus' name, I beat every sickness and stay healthy, protected by Your love.
In Jesus' name, my heart, lungs, and every organ are in perfect condition.
In Jesus' name, I'm full of energy, ready to tackle anything.
In Jesus' name, I recover quickly from any lying symptoms that opposes the truth that I am Healed.
In Jesus' name, I walk free from pain, feeling good every day.
In Jesus' name, my mind and body are refreshed, feeling peace and calm.
In Jesus' name, I take care of my body, knowing it's a gift from Him.
In Jesus' name, I keep a happy heart and mind, which keeps me healthy.
In Jesus' name, I enjoy good food that makes me strong and keeps me well.
In Jesus' name, I shine with health, showing others how good He is.
In Jesus' name, I overcome every health challenge, showing His power in me.
In Jesus' name, I sleep well every night, waking up refreshed and ready.
In Jesus' name, I move easily and freely, enjoying every moment.
In Jesus' name, laughter is my medicine, keeping me joyful and well.
In Jesus' name, I live a long, happy life, full of health and joy.
In Jesus' name, I am healthy, living life to the fullest.
In Jesus' name, I thank You for great health every day.
In Jesus' name, like the woman who touched His cloak and was healed, I reach out in faith for my health.
In Jesus' name, as Lazarus was raised from the dead, I trust in the restoration of my health.
In Jesus' name, like the lepers who were cleansed, I believe in being made whole.
In Jesus' name, just as Peter walked on water by faith, I step out believing I am healed against all odds.
In Jesus' name, like the paralyzed man who took up his mat and walked, I claim strength and mobility.
In Jesus' name, as the man with the withered hand was restored, I see strength returning to my body.
I am full of vitality, because the same spirit that raised Jesus from the dead lives in me.
I declare every cell and organ is renewed and functions in perfection.
I am in great health, even as my soul prospers.
I am a temple of the Holy Spirit, glorifying God in my body.
I am confident in the Lord's promise to heal all my diseases.
I am blessed with the promise that God will satisfy me with long life.
I am assured that my health will spring forth speedily.
I am revitalized as I meditate on God's word day and night.
I am walking by faith, not by sight.
God's word heals, protects, and restores me all the days of my life.
I am free from pain and discomfort in Jesus' name.
I am healed and restored in every area of my body.
I claim robust health and reject all sickness in Jesus' name.
Every cell in my body resonates with God’s healing power.
I declare I have great health and a strong immune system.
I am blessed with health and reject any form of illness.
I am shielded from sickness by the blood of Jesus.
But I will restore you to health and heal your wounds, declares the LORD.
And Jesus said to her, 'Daughter, your faith has healed you. Go in peace and be freed from your suffering.'
Then they cried to the LORD in their trouble, and he saved them from their distress.
Praise the LORD, my soul, and forget not all his benefits— who forgives all your sins and heals all your diseases.
The Spirit of God has made me, and the breath of the Almighty gives me life.
I have given you health and healing, trust in my restoration.
Your faith has made you well, go in peace, free from suffering.
I am the Lord who heals you, lean on my promises of healing.
Be of good cheer, your sickness will not end in death, but for the glory of God.
Rise, take up your bed and walk, your faith has made you whole.
Believe in my healing power, it is my will for you to be well.
I am with you always, to the very end, bringing health and healing.
By my stripes, you are healed, hold onto my promise of redemption.
Fear not, for I am with you, be not dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will not fear, You are with me, You are my God! You will strengthen me, help me, and uphold me!

declarations.text: I will restore you to health and heal your wounds, trust in my compassionate touch.
Ask, and it will be given to you, seek healing, and you shall find.
I came that they may have life and have it abundantly, embrace the fullness of health.
